   20: -module(gen_sctp_SUITE).
   21: 
   22: -include_lib("common_test/include/ct.hrl").
   23: -include_lib("kernel/include/inet_sctp.hrl").
   24: -include("kernel_test_lib.hrl").
   25: 
   26: %%-compile(export_all).
   27: 
   28: -export([all/0, suite/0, groups/0,
   29: 	 init_per_suite/1, end_per_suite/1,
   30: 	 init_per_group/2, end_per_group/2,
   31: 	 init_per_testcase/2, end_per_testcase/2]).
   32: -export([
   33:          skip_old_solaris/1,
   34:          basic/1,
   35: 
   36:          api_open_close/1,
   37:          api_listen/1,
   38:          api_connect_init/1,
   39:          api_connectx_init/1,
   40:          api_opts/1,
   41: 
   42:          xfer_min/1,xfer_active/1,def_sndrcvinfo/1,implicit_inet6/1,
   43:          open_multihoming_ipv4_socket/1,
   44:          open_unihoming_ipv6_socket/1,
   45:          open_multihoming_ipv6_socket/1,
   46:          open_multihoming_ipv4_and_ipv6_socket/1,
   47:          basic_stream/1, xfer_stream_min/1, active_n/1,
   48:          peeloff_active_once/1, peeloff_active_true/1, peeloff_active_n/1,
   49:          buffers/1, send_block/1,
   50:          names_unihoming_ipv4/1, names_unihoming_ipv6/1,
   51:          names_multihoming_ipv4/1, names_multihoming_ipv6/1,
   52:          recv_close/1,
   53: 
   54:          t_simple_local_sockaddr_in_send_recv/1,
   55:          t_simple_link_local_sockaddr_in_send_recv/1,
   56:          t_simple_local_sockaddr_in6_send_recv/1,
   57:          t_simple_link_local_sockaddr_in6_send_recv/1,
   58:          t_simple_local_sockaddr_in_connectx_init/1,
   59: 
   60:          non_block_send/1
   61:         ]).
   62: 
   63: suite() ->
   64:     [{ct_hooks,[ts_install_cth]},
   65:      {timetrap,{minutes,1}}].
   66: 
   67: all() ->
   68:     G = case is_old_solaris() of
   69: 	    true -> old_solaris;
   70: 	    false -> extensive
   71: 	end,
   72:     [
   73:      {group, smoke},
   74:      {group, G},
   75:      {group, sockaddr},
   76:      {group, misc}
   77:     ].
   78: 
   79: groups() -> 
   80:     [
   81:      {smoke,       [], smoke_cases()},
   82:      {old_solaris, [], old_solaris_cases()},
   83:      {extensive,   [], extensive_cases()},
   84: 
   85:      {sockaddr,    [], sockaddr_cases()},
   86: 
   87:      {misc,        [], misc_cases()}
   88:     ].
   89: 
   90: smoke_cases() ->
   91:     [
   92:      basic,
   93:      basic_stream
   94:     ].
   95: 
   96: old_solaris_cases() ->
   97:     [
   98:      skip_old_solaris
   99:     ].
  100: 
  101: extensive_cases() ->
  102:     [
  103:      api_open_close, api_listen, api_connect_init, api_connectx_init,
  104:      api_opts, xfer_min, xfer_active, def_sndrcvinfo, implicit_inet6,
  105:      open_multihoming_ipv4_socket,
  106:      open_unihoming_ipv6_socket,
  107:      open_multihoming_ipv6_socket,
  108:      open_multihoming_ipv4_and_ipv6_socket, active_n,
  109:      xfer_stream_min, peeloff_active_once,
  110:      peeloff_active_true, peeloff_active_n, buffers, send_block,
  111:      names_unihoming_ipv4, names_unihoming_ipv6,
  112:      names_multihoming_ipv4, names_multihoming_ipv6,
  113:      recv_close
  114:     ].
  115: 
  116: sockaddr_cases() ->
  117:     [
  118:      t_simple_local_sockaddr_in_send_recv,
  119:      t_simple_link_local_sockaddr_in_send_recv,
  120:      t_simple_local_sockaddr_in6_send_recv,
  121:      t_simple_link_local_sockaddr_in6_send_recv,
  122:      t_simple_local_sockaddr_in_connectx_init
  123:     ].
  124: 
  125: misc_cases() ->
  126:     [
  127:      non_block_send
  128:     ].
  129: 
  130: 
  131: 
  132: %% This (Config) was ignored before, why?
  133: init_per_suite(Config0) ->
  134: 
  135:     ?P("init_per_suite -> entry with"
  136:        "~n      Config: ~p"
  137:        "~n      Nodes:  ~p", [Config0, erlang:nodes()]),
  138: 
  139:     case gen_sctp:open() of
  140: 	{ok, Socket} ->
  141: 	    gen_sctp:close(Socket),
  142: 
  143:             case ?LIB:init_per_suite(Config0) of
  144:                 {skip, _} = SKIP ->
  145:                     SKIP;
  146: 
  147:                 Config1 when is_list(Config1) ->
  148: 
  149:                     ?P("init_per_suite -> end when "
  150:                        "~n      Config: ~p", [Config1]),
  151: 
  152:                     %% We need a monitor on this node also
  153:                     kernel_test_sys_monitor:start(),
  154: 
  155:                     Config1
  156:             end;
  157: 
  158: 	{error, Error}
  159: 	  when Error =:= eprotonosupport;
  160: 	       Error =:= esocktnosupport ->
  161: 	    {skip,"SCTP not supported on this machine"}
  162:     end.
  163: 
  164: end_per_suite(Config0) ->
  165: 
  166:     ?P("end_per_suite -> entry with"
  167:        "~n      Config: ~p"
  168:        "~n      Nodes:  ~p", [Config0, erlang:nodes()]),
  169: 
  170:     %% Stop the local monitor
  171:     kernel_test_sys_monitor:stop(),
  172: 
  173:     Config1 = ?LIB:end_per_suite(Config0),
  174: 
  175:     ?P("end_per_suite -> "
  176:        "~n      Nodes: ~p", [erlang:nodes()]),
  177: 
  178:     Config1.
  179: 
  180: init_per_group(sockaddr = _GroupName, Config) ->
  181:     ?P("init_per_group(sockaddr) -> do we support 'socket'"),
  182:     try socket:info() of
  183: 	_ ->
  184:             ?P("init_per_group(sockaddr) -> we support 'socket'"),
  185:             Config
  186:     catch
  187:         error : notsup ->
  188:             ?P("init_per_group(sockaddr) -> we *do not* support 'socket'"),
  189:             {skip, "esock not supported"};
  190:         error : undef ->
  191:             ?P("init_per_group(sockaddr) -> 'socket' not configured"),
  192:             {skip, "esock not configured"}
  193:     end;
  194: init_per_group(_GroupName, Config) ->
  195:     Config.
  196: 
  197: end_per_group(_GroupName, Config) ->
  198:     Config.
  199: 
  200: 
  201: init_per_testcase(api_connectx_init = Case, Config) ->
  202:     check_sctp_connectx(Case, Config);
  203: init_per_testcase(t_simple_local_sockaddr_in_connectx_init = Case, Config) ->
  204:     check_sctp_connectx(Case, Config);
  205: init_per_testcase(names_multihoming_ipv4 = Case, Config) ->
  206:     case lists:keysearch(label, 1, Config) of
  207:         {value, {label, docker}} ->
  208:             {skip, "Unstable/broken on docker"};
  209:         _ ->
  210:             init_per_testcase_common(Case, Config)
  211:     end;
  212: init_per_testcase(Case, Config) ->
  213:     init_per_testcase_common(Case, Config).
  214:     
  215: init_per_testcase_common(_Case, Config) ->
  216: 
  217:     ?P("init_per_testcase -> entry with"
  218:        "~n   Config:   ~p"
  219:        "~n   Nodes:    ~p"
  220:        "~n   Links:    ~p"
  221:        "~n   Monitors: ~p",
  222:        [Config, erlang:nodes(), pi(links), pi(monitors)]),
  223: 
  224:     kernel_test_global_sys_monitor:reset_events(),
  225: 
  226:     ?P("init_per_testcase -> done when"
  227:        "~n   Nodes:    ~p"
  228:        "~n   Links:    ~p"
  229:        "~n   Monitors: ~p", [erlang:nodes(), pi(links), pi(monitors)]),
  230: 
  231:     Config.
  232: 
  233: end_per_testcase(_Case, Config) ->
  234:     ?P("end_per_testcase -> entry with"
  235:        "~n   Config:   ~p"
  236:        "~n   Nodes:    ~p"
  237:        "~n   Links:    ~p"
  238:        "~n   Monitors: ~p",
  239:        [Config, erlang:nodes(), pi(links), pi(monitors)]),
  240: 
  241:     ?P("system events during test: "
  242:        "~n   ~p", [kernel_test_global_sys_monitor:events()]),
  243: 
  244:     ?P("end_per_testcase -> done with"
  245:        "~n   Nodes:    ~p"
  246:        "~n   Links:    ~p"
  247:        "~n   Monitors: ~p", [erlang:nodes(), pi(links), pi(monitors)]),
  248:     ok.
  249: 
  250: 
  251: -define(LOGVAR(Var), begin io:format(??Var" = ~p~n", [Var]), Var end).
  252: -define(no_return(Expr), error({unexpected, Expr})).
  253: 
  254: check_sctp_connectx(Case, Config) ->
  255:     {ok,S} = gen_sctp:open([]),
  256:     try
  257:         {ok,Pb} = inet:port(S),
  258:         case gen_sctp:connectx_init(S, [{127,0,0,1}], Pb, []) of
  259:             {error, enotsup} ->
  260:                 {skip, "sctp_connectx unsupported"};
  261:             _ ->
  262:                 init_per_testcase_common(Case, Config)
  263:         end
  264:     after
  265:         gen_sctp:close(S)
  266:     end.
  267: 
  268: is_old_solaris() ->
  269:     os:type() =:= {unix,sunos} andalso os:version() < {5,12,0}.
  270: 
  271: skip_old_solaris(_Config) ->
  272:     {skip,"Unreliable test cases and/or implementation on old Solaris"}.
  273: 
  274: %% Hello world.
  275: basic(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  276:     {ok,S} = gen_sctp:open(),
  277:     ok = gen_sctp:close(S),
  278:     ok.
  279: 
  280: %% Minimal data transfer.
  281: xfer_min(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  282:     Stream = 0,
  283:     Data = <<"The quick brown fox jumps over a lazy dog 0123456789">>,
  284:     Loopback = {127,0,0,1},
  285:     StatOpts =
  286: 	[recv_avg,recv_cnt,recv_max,recv_oct,
  287: 	 send_avg,send_cnt,send_max,send_oct],
  288:     {ok,Sb} = gen_sctp:open([{type,seqpacket}]),
  289:     {ok,SbStat1} = inet:getstat(Sb, StatOpts),
  290:     {ok,Pb} = inet:port(Sb),
  291:     ok = gen_sctp:listen(Sb, true),
  292: 
  293:     {ok,Sa} = gen_sctp:open(),
  294:     {ok,Pa} = inet:port(Sa),
  295:     {ok,#sctp_assoc_change{state=comm_up,
  296: 			   error=0,
  297: 			   outbound_streams=SaOutboundStreams,
  298: 			   inbound_streams=SaInboundStreams,
  299: 			   assoc_id=SaAssocId}=SaAssocChange} =
  300: 	gen_sctp:connect(Sa, Loopback, Pb, []),
  301:     {SbAssocId,SaOutboundStreams,SaInboundStreams} =
  302: 	case recv_event(log_ok(gen_sctp:recv(Sb, infinity))) of
  303: 	    {Loopback,Pa,
  304: 	     #sctp_assoc_change{state=comm_up,
  305: 				error=0,
  306: 				outbound_streams=SbOutboundStreams,
  307: 				inbound_streams=SbInboundStreams,
  308: 				assoc_id=AssocId}} ->
  309: 		{AssocId,SbInboundStreams,SbOutboundStreams};
  310: 	    {Loopback,Pa,
  311: 	     #sctp_paddr_change{state=addr_confirmed,
  312: 				addr={Loopback,Pa},
  313: 				error=0,
  314: 				assoc_id=AssocId}} ->
  315: 		{Loopback,Pa,
  316: 		 #sctp_assoc_change{state=comm_up,
  317: 				    error=0,
  318: 				    outbound_streams=SbOutboundStreams,
  319: 				    inbound_streams=SbInboundStreams,
  320: 				    assoc_id=AssocId}} =
  321: 		    recv_event(log_ok(gen_sctp:recv(Sb, infinity))),
  322: 		{AssocId,SbInboundStreams,SbOutboundStreams}
  323: 	end,
  324: 
  325:     ok = gen_sctp:send(Sa, SaAssocId, 0, Data),
  326:     case log_ok(gen_sctp:recv(Sb, infinity)) of
  327: 	{Loopback,
  328: 	 Pa,
  329: 	 [#sctp_sndrcvinfo{stream   = Stream,
  330: 			   assoc_id = SbAssocId}],
  331: 	 Data} -> ok;
  332: 	Event1 ->
  333: 	    case recv_event(Event1) of
  334: 		{Loopback,Pa,
  335: 		 #sctp_paddr_change{addr = {Loopback,_},
  336: 				    state = State,
  337: 				    error = 0,
  338: 				    assoc_id = SbAssocId}}
  339: 		  when State =:= addr_available;
  340: 		       State =:= addr_confirmed ->
  341: 		    {Loopback,
  342: 		     Pa,
  343: 		     [#sctp_sndrcvinfo{stream=Stream,
  344: 				       assoc_id=SbAssocId}],
  345: 		     Data} = log_ok(gen_sctp:recv(Sb, infinity))
  346: 	    end
  347:     end,
  348:     ok = gen_sctp:send(Sb, SbAssocId, 0, Data),
  349:     case log_ok(gen_sctp:recv(Sa, infinity)) of
  350: 	{Loopback,Pb,
  351: 	 [#sctp_sndrcvinfo{stream=Stream,
  352: 			   assoc_id=SaAssocId}],
  353: 	 Data} ->
  354: 	    ok;
  355: 	Event2 ->
  356: 	    {Loopback,Pb,
  357: 	     #sctp_paddr_change{addr={_,Pb},
  358: 				state=addr_confirmed,
  359: 				error=0,
  360: 				assoc_id=SaAssocId}} =
  361: 		recv_event(Event2),
  362: 	    {Loopback,
  363: 	     Pb,
  364: 	     [#sctp_sndrcvinfo{stream=Stream,
  365: 			       assoc_id=SaAssocId}],
  366: 	     Data} =
  367: 		log_ok(gen_sctp:recv(Sa, infinity))
  368:     end,
  369:     %%
  370:     ok = gen_sctp:eof(Sa, SaAssocChange),
  371:     {Loopback,Pa,#sctp_shutdown_event{assoc_id=SbAssocId}} =
  372: 	recv_event(log_ok(gen_sctp:recv(Sb, infinity))),
  373:     {Loopback,Pb,
  374:      #sctp_assoc_change{state=shutdown_comp,
  375: 			error=0,
  376: 			assoc_id=SaAssocId}} =
  377: 	recv_event(log_ok(gen_sctp:recv(Sa, infinity))),
  378:     {Loopback,Pa,
  379:      #sctp_assoc_change{state=shutdown_comp,
  380: 			error=0,
  381: 			assoc_id=SbAssocId}} =
  382: 	recv_event(log_ok(gen_sctp:recv(Sb, infinity))),
  383:     ok = gen_sctp:close(Sa),
  384:     {ok,SbStat2} = inet:getstat(Sb, StatOpts),
  385:     [] = filter_stat_eq(SbStat1, SbStat2),
  386:     ok = gen_sctp:close(Sb),
  387: 
  388:     receive
  389: 	Msg -> ct:fail({received,Msg})
  390:     after 17 -> ok
  391:     end,
  392:     ok.
  393: 
  394: filter_stat_eq([], []) ->
  395:     [];
  396: filter_stat_eq([{Tag,Val1}=Stat|SbStat1], [{Tag,Val2}|SbStat2]) ->
  397:     if
  398: 	Val1 == Val2 ->
  399: 	    [Stat|filter_stat_eq(SbStat1, SbStat2)];
  400: 	true ->
  401: 	    filter_stat_eq(SbStat1, SbStat2)
  402:     end.
  403: 
  404: 
  405: 
  406: %% Minimal data transfer in active mode.
  407: xfer_active(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  408:     Timeout = 2000,
  409:     Stream = 0,
  410:     Data = <<"The quick brown fox jumps over a lazy dog 0123456789">>,
  411:     Loopback = {127,0,0,1},
  412:     {ok,Sb} = gen_sctp:open([{active,true}]),
  413:     {ok,Pb} = inet:port(Sb),
  414:     ok = gen_sctp:listen(Sb, true),
  415: 
  416:     {ok,Sa} = gen_sctp:open([{active,true}]),
  417:     {ok,Pa} = inet:port(Sa),
  418:     ok = gen_sctp:connect_init(Sa, Loopback, Pb, []),
  419:     #sctp_assoc_change{state=comm_up,
  420: 		       error=0,
  421: 		       outbound_streams=SaOutboundStreams,
  422: 		       inbound_streams=SaInboundStreams,
  423: 		       assoc_id=SaAssocId} = SaAssocChange =
  424: 	recv_assoc_change(Sa, Loopback, Pb, Timeout),
  425:     io:format("Sa=~p, Pa=~p, Sb=~p, Pb=~p, SaAssocId=~p, "
  426: 	      "SaOutboundStreams=~p, SaInboundStreams=~p~n",
  427: 	      [Sa,Pa,Sb,Pb,SaAssocId,
  428: 	       SaOutboundStreams,SaInboundStreams]),
  429:     #sctp_assoc_change{state=comm_up,
  430: 		       error=0,
  431: 		       outbound_streams=SbOutboundStreams,
  432: 		       inbound_streams=SbInboundStreams,
  433: 		       assoc_id=SbAssocId} =
  434: 	recv_assoc_change(Sb, Loopback, Pa, Timeout),
  435:     SbOutboundStreams = SaInboundStreams,
  436:     SbInboundStreams = SaOutboundStreams,
  437:     io:format("SbAssocId=~p~n", [SbAssocId]),
  438: 
  439:     case recv_paddr_change(Sa, Loopback, Pb, 314) of
  440: 	#sctp_paddr_change{state=addr_confirmed,
  441: 			   addr={_,Pb},
  442: 			   error=0,
  443: 			   assoc_id=SaAssocId} -> ok;
  444: 	#sctp_paddr_change{state=addr_available,
  445: 			   addr={_,Pb},
  446: 			   error=0,
  447: 			   assoc_id=SaAssocId} -> ok;
  448: 	timeout -> ok
  449:     end,
  450:     case recv_paddr_change(Sb, Loopback, Pa, 314) of
  451: 	#sctp_paddr_change{state=addr_confirmed,
  452: 			   addr={Loopback,Pa},
  453: 			   error=0,
  454: 			   assoc_id=SbAssocId} -> ok;
  455: 	#sctp_paddr_change{state=addr_available,
  456: 			   addr={Loopback,P},
  457: 			   error=0,
  458: 			   assoc_id=SbAssocId} ->
  459: 	    match_unless_solaris(Pa, P);
  460: 	timeout -> ok
  461:     end,
  462:     [] = flush(),
  463: 
  464:     ok =
  465: 	do_from_other_process(
  466: 	  fun () -> gen_sctp:send(Sa, SaAssocId, 0, Data) end),
  467:     receive
  468: 	{sctp,Sb,Loopback,Pa,
  469: 	 {[#sctp_sndrcvinfo{stream=Stream,
  470: 			    assoc_id=SbAssocId}],
  471: 	  Data}} -> ok
  472:     after Timeout ->
  473: 	    ct:fail({timeout,flush()})
  474:     end,
  475:     ok = gen_sctp:send(Sb, SbAssocId, 0, Data),
  476:     receive
  477: 	{sctp,Sa,Loopback,Pb,
  478: 	 {[#sctp_sndrcvinfo{stream=Stream,
  479: 			    assoc_id=SaAssocId}],
  480: 	  Data}} -> ok
  481:     after Timeout ->
  482: 	    ct:fail({timeout,flush()})
  483:     end,
  484:     %%
  485:     ok = gen_sctp:abort(Sa, SaAssocChange),
  486:     case recv_assoc_change(Sb, Loopback, Pa, Timeout) of
  487: 	#sctp_assoc_change{state=comm_lost,
  488: 			   assoc_id=SbAssocId} -> ok;
  489: 	timeout ->
  490: 	    ct:fail({timeout,flush()})
  491:     end,
  492:     ok = gen_sctp:close(Sb),
  493:     case recv_assoc_change(Sa, Loopback, Pb, Timeout) of
  494: 	#sctp_assoc_change{state=comm_lost,
  495: 			   assoc_id=SaAssocId} -> ok;
  496: 	timeout ->
  497: 	    io:format("timeout waiting for comm_lost on Sa~n"),
  498: 	    match_unless_solaris(ok, {timeout,flush()})
  499:     end,
  500:     receive
  501: 	{sctp_error,Sa,enotconn} -> ok % Solaris
  502:     after 17 -> ok
  503:     end,
  504:     ok = gen_sctp:close(Sa),
  505:     %%
  506:     receive
  507: 	Msg -> ct:fail({unexpected,[Msg]++flush()})
  508:     after 17 -> ok
  509:     end,
  510:     ok.
  511: 
  512: recv_assoc_change(S, Addr, Port, Timeout) ->
  513:     receive
  514: 	{sctp,S,Addr,Port,{[], #sctp_assoc_change{}=AssocChange}} ->
  515: 	    AssocChange;
  516: 	{sctp,S,Addr,Port,
  517: 	 {[#sctp_sndrcvinfo{assoc_id=AssocId}],
  518: 	  #sctp_assoc_change{assoc_id=AssocId}=AssocChange}} ->
  519: 	    AssocChange
  520:     after Timeout ->
  521: 	    timeout
  522:     end.
  523: 
  524: recv_paddr_change(S, Addr, Port, Timeout) ->
  525:     receive
  526: 	{sctp,S,Addr,Port,{[], #sctp_paddr_change{}=PaddrChange}} ->
  527: 	    PaddrChange;
  528: 	{sctp,S,Addr,Port,
  529: 	 {[#sctp_sndrcvinfo{assoc_id=AssocId}],
  530: 	  #sctp_paddr_change{assoc_id=AssocId}=PaddrChange}} ->
  531: 	    PaddrChange
  532:     after Timeout ->
  533: 	    timeout
  534:     end.
  535: 
  536: %% Test that #sctp_sndrcvinfo{} parameters set on a socket
  537: %% are used by gen_sctp:send/4.
  538: def_sndrcvinfo(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  539:     Loopback = {127,0,0,1},
  540:     Data = <<"What goes up, must come down.">>,
  541:     %%
  542:     S1 =
  543: 	log_ok(gen_sctp:open(
  544: 		 0, [{sctp_default_send_param,#sctp_sndrcvinfo{ppid=17}}])),
  545:     ?LOGVAR(S1),
  546:     P1 =
  547: 	log_ok(inet:port(S1)),
  548:     ?LOGVAR(P1),
  549:     #sctp_sndrcvinfo{ppid=17, context=0, timetolive=0, assoc_id=0} =
  550: 	getopt(S1, sctp_default_send_param),
  551:     ok =
  552: 	gen_sctp:listen(S1, true),
  553:     %%
  554:     S2 =
  555: 	log_ok(gen_sctp:open()),
  556:     ?LOGVAR(S2),
  557:     P2 =
  558: 	log_ok(inet:port(S2)),
  559:     ?LOGVAR(P2),
  560:     #sctp_sndrcvinfo{ppid=0, context=0, timetolive=0, assoc_id=0} =
  561: 	getopt(S2, sctp_default_send_param),
  562:     %%
  563:     #sctp_assoc_change{
  564:        state=comm_up,
  565:        error=0,
  566:        assoc_id=S2AssocId} = S2AssocChange =
  567: 	log_ok(gen_sctp:connect(S2, Loopback, P1, [])),
  568:     ?LOGVAR(S2AssocChange),
  569:     S1AssocId =
  570: 	case recv_event(log_ok(gen_sctp:recv(S1))) of
  571: 	    {Loopback,P2,
  572: 	     #sctp_assoc_change{
  573: 		state=comm_up,
  574: 		error=0,
  575: 		assoc_id=AssocId}} ->
  576: 		AssocId;
  577: 	    {Loopback,P2,
  578: 	     #sctp_paddr_change{
  579: 		state=addr_confirmed,
  580: 		error=0,
  581: 		assoc_id=AssocId}} ->
  582: 		{Loopback,P2,
  583: 		 #sctp_assoc_change{
  584: 		    state=comm_up,
  585: 		    error=0,
  586: 		    assoc_id=AssocId}} =
  587: 		    recv_event(log_ok(gen_sctp:recv(S1))),
  588: 		AssocId
  589: 	end,
  590:     ?LOGVAR(S1AssocId),
  591: 
  592:     #sctp_sndrcvinfo{
  593:        ppid=17, context=0, timetolive=0} = %, assoc_id=S1AssocId} =
  594: 	getopt(
  595: 	  S1, sctp_default_send_param, #sctp_sndrcvinfo{assoc_id=S1AssocId}),
  596:     #sctp_sndrcvinfo{
  597:        ppid=0, context=0, timetolive=0} = %, assoc_id=S2AssocId} =
  598: 	getopt(
  599: 	  S2, sctp_default_send_param, #sctp_sndrcvinfo{assoc_id=S2AssocId}),
  600:     %%
  601:     ok =
  602: 	gen_sctp:send(S1, S1AssocId, 1, <<"1: ",Data/binary>>),
  603:     case log_ok(gen_sctp:recv(S2)) of
  604: 	{Loopback,P1,
  605: 	 [#sctp_sndrcvinfo{
  606: 	     stream=1, ppid=17, context=0, assoc_id=S2AssocId}],
  607: 	 <<"1: ",Data/binary>>} -> ok;
  608: 	Event1 ->
  609: 	    {Loopback,P1,
  610: 	     #sctp_paddr_change{state=addr_confirmed,
  611: 				addr={_,P1},
  612: 				error=0,
  613: 				assoc_id=S2AssocId}} =
  614: 		recv_event(Event1),
  615: 	    {Loopback,P1,
  616: 	     [#sctp_sndrcvinfo{
  617: 		 stream=1, ppid=17, context=0, assoc_id=S2AssocId}],
  618: 	     <<"1: ",Data/binary>>} =
  619: 		log_ok(gen_sctp:recv(S2))
  620:     end,
  621:     %%
  622:     ok =
  623: 	setopt(
  624: 	  S1, sctp_default_send_param, #sctp_sndrcvinfo{ppid=18}),
  625:     ok =
  626: 	setopt(
  627: 	  S1, sctp_default_send_param,
  628: 	  #sctp_sndrcvinfo{ppid=19, assoc_id=S1AssocId}),
  629:     #sctp_sndrcvinfo{
  630:        ppid=18, context=0, timetolive=0, assoc_id=0} =
  631: 	getopt(S1, sctp_default_send_param),
  632:     #sctp_sndrcvinfo{
  633:        ppid=19, context=0, timetolive=0, assoc_id=S1AssocId} =
  634: 	getopt(
  635: 	  S1, sctp_default_send_param, #sctp_sndrcvinfo{assoc_id=S1AssocId}),
  636:     %%
  637:     ok =
  638: 	gen_sctp:send(S1, S1AssocId, 0, <<"2: ",Data/binary>>),
  639:     case log_ok(gen_sctp:recv(S2)) of
  640: 	{Loopback,P1,
  641: 	 [#sctp_sndrcvinfo{
  642: 	     stream=0, ppid=19, context=0, assoc_id=S2AssocId}],
  643: 	 <<"2: ",Data/binary>>} -> ok
  644:     end,
  645:     ok =
  646: 	gen_sctp:send(S2, S2AssocChange, 1, <<"3: ",Data/binary>>),
  647:     case log_ok(gen_sctp:recv(S1)) of
  648: 	{Loopback,P2,
  649: 	 [#sctp_sndrcvinfo{
  650: 	     stream=1, ppid=0, context=0, assoc_id=S1AssocId}],
  651: 	 <<"3: ",Data/binary>>} -> ok;
  652: 	Event2 ->
  653: 	    case recv_event(Event2) of
  654: 		{Loopback,P2,
  655: 		 #sctp_paddr_change{
  656: 		    addr={Loopback,_},
  657: 		    state=State,
  658: 		    error=0, assoc_id=S1AssocId}}
  659: 		  when State =:= addr_available;
  660: 		       State =:= addr_confirmed ->
  661: 		    case log_ok(gen_sctp:recv(S1)) of
  662: 			{Loopback,P2,
  663: 			 [#sctp_sndrcvinfo{
  664: 			     stream=1, ppid=0, context=0,
  665: 			     assoc_id=S1AssocId}],
  666: 			 <<"3: ",Data/binary>>} -> ok
  667: 		    end
  668: 	    end
  669:     end,
  670:     ok =
  671: 	do_from_other_process(
  672: 	  fun () ->
  673: 		  gen_sctp:send(
  674: 		    S2,
  675: 		    #sctp_sndrcvinfo{stream=0, ppid=20, assoc_id=S2AssocId},
  676: 		    <<"4: ",Data/binary>>)
  677: 	  end),
  678:     case log_ok(do_from_other_process(fun() -> gen_sctp:recv(S1) end)) of
  679: 	{Loopback,P2,
  680: 	 [#sctp_sndrcvinfo{
  681: 	     stream=0, ppid=20, context=0, assoc_id=S1AssocId}],
  682: 	 <<"4: ",Data/binary>>} -> ok
  683:     end,
  684:     %%
  685:     ok =
  686: 	gen_sctp:close(S1),
  687:     ok =
  688: 	gen_sctp:close(S2),
  689:     receive
  690: 	Msg ->
  691: 	    ct:fail({received,Msg})
  692:     after 17 -> ok
  693:     end,
  694:     ok.
  695: 
  696: getopt(S, Opt) ->
  697:     {ok,[{Opt,Val}]} = inet:getopts(S, [Opt]),
  698:     Val.
  699: 
  700: getopt(S, Opt, Param) ->
  701:     {ok,[{Opt,Val}]} = inet:getopts(S, [{Opt,Param}]),
  702:     Val.
  703: 
  704: setopt(S, Opt, Val) ->
  705:     inet:setopts(S, [{Opt,Val}]).
  706: 
  707: 
  708: flush() ->
  709:     receive
  710: 	Msg ->
  711: 	    [Msg|flush()]
  712:     after 17 ->
  713: 	    []
  714:     end.
  715: 
  716: %% Test the API function open/1,2 and close/1.
  717: api_open_close(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  718:     ?TC_TRY(?FUNCTION_NAME, fun() -> do_api_open_close() end).
  719: 
  720: do_api_open_close() ->
  721:     {ok,S1} = gen_sctp:open(0),
  722:     {ok,P}  = inet:port(S1),
  723:     ok      = gen_sctp:close(S1),
  724: 
  725:     {ok,S2} = gen_sctp:open(P),
  726:     {ok,P}  = inet:port(S2),
  727:     ok      = gen_sctp:close(S2),
  728: 
  729:     {ok,S3} = gen_sctp:open([{port,P}]),
  730:     {ok,P}  = inet:port(S3),
  731:     ok      = gen_sctp:close(S3),
  732: 
  733:     {ok,S4} = gen_sctp:open(P, []),
  734:     {ok,P}  = inet:port(S4),
  735:     ok      = gen_sctp:close(S4),
  736: 
  737:     {ok,S5} = gen_sctp:open(P, [{debug, false}, {ifaddr,any}, {debug, true}]),
  738:     {ok,P}  = inet:port(S5),
  739:     ok      = gen_sctp:close(S5),
  740: 
  741:     ok      = gen_sctp:close(S5),
  742: 
  743:     try gen_sctp:close(0)
  744:     catch error:badarg -> ok
  745:     end,
  746: 
  747:     try gen_sctp:open({})
  748:     catch error:badarg -> ok
  749:     end,
  750: 
  751:     try gen_sctp:open(-1)
  752:     catch error:badarg -> ok
  753:     end,
  754: 
  755:     try gen_sctp:open(65536)
  756:     catch error:badarg -> ok
  757:     end,
  758: 
  759:     try gen_sctp:open(make_ref(), [])
  760:     catch error:badarg -> ok
  761:     end,
  762: 
  763:     try gen_sctp:open(0, {})
  764:     catch error:badarg -> ok
  765:     end,
  766: 
  767:     try gen_sctp:open(0, [make_ref()])
  768:     catch error:badarg -> ok
  769:     end,
  770: 
  771:     try gen_sctp:open([{invalid_option,0}])
  772:     catch error:badarg -> ok
  773:     end,
  774: 
  775:     try gen_sctp:open(0, [{mode,invalid_mode}])
  776:     catch error:badarg -> ok
  777:     end,
  778:     ok.
  779: 
  780: %% Test the API function listen/2.
  781: api_listen(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  782:     Localhost = {127,0,0,1},
  783: 
  784:     try gen_sctp:listen(0, true)
  785:     catch error:badarg -> ok
  786:     end,
  787: 
  788:     {ok,S} = gen_sctp:open(),
  789:     {ok,Pb} = inet:port(S),
  790:     try gen_sctp:listen(S, not_allowed_for_listen)
  791:     catch error:badarg -> ok
  792:     end,
  793:     ok = gen_sctp:close(S),
  794:     {error,closed} = gen_sctp:listen(S, true),
  795: 
  796:     {ok,Sb} = gen_sctp:open(Pb),
  797:     {ok,Sa} = gen_sctp:open(),
  798: 
  799:     element(1, os:type()) =:= unix andalso
  800:         begin
  801:             {error, nxdomain} = gen_sctp:connect(Sa, "", 65535, []),
  802:             {error, nxdomain} = gen_sctp:connect(Sa, '', 65535, [])
  803:         end,
  804:     {error, nxdomain} = gen_sctp:connect(Sa, ".", 65535, []),
  805:     {error, nxdomain} = gen_sctp:connect(Sa, '.', 65535, []),
  806: 
  807:     case gen_sctp:connect(Sa, localhost, Pb, []) of
  808: 	{error,econnrefused} ->
  809: 	    {ok,{Localhost,
  810: 		 Pb,[],
  811: 		 #sctp_assoc_change{
  812: 		    state=comm_lost}}} =
  813: 		gen_sctp:recv(Sa, infinity);
  814: 	{error,#sctp_assoc_change{state=cant_assoc}} ->
  815: 	    ok%;
  816: 	    %% {error,{Localhost,Pb,_,#sctp_assoc_change{state=cant_assoc}}} ->
  817: 	    %% 	  ok
  818:     end,
  819:     ok = gen_sctp:listen(Sb, true),
  820:     {ok,#sctp_assoc_change{state=comm_up,
  821: 			   error=0}} =
  822: 	gen_sctp:connect(Sa, localhost, Pb, []),
  823:     ok = gen_sctp:close(Sa),
  824:     ok = gen_sctp:close(Sb),
  825:     ok.
  826: 
  827: %% Test the API function connect_init/4.
  828: api_connect_init(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  829:     Localhost = {127,0,0,1},
  830: 
  831:     {ok,S} = gen_sctp:open(),
  832:     {ok,Pb} = inet:port(S),
  833:     try gen_sctp:connect_init(S, Localhost, not_allowed_for_port, [])
  834:     catch error:badarg -> ok
  835:     end,
  836:     try gen_sctp:connect_init(S, Localhost, 12345, not_allowed_for_opts)
  837:     catch error:badarg -> ok
  838:     end,
  839:     ok = gen_sctp:close(S),
  840:     {error,closed} = gen_sctp:connect_init(S, Localhost, 12345, []),
  841: 
  842:     {ok,Sb} = gen_sctp:open(Pb),
  843:     {ok,Sa} = gen_sctp:open(),
  844:     case gen_sctp:connect_init(Sa, localhost, Pb, []) of
  845: 	{error,econnrefused} ->
  846: 	    {Localhost,Pb,#sctp_assoc_change{state=comm_lost}} =
  847: 		recv_event(log_ok(gen_sctp:recv(Sa, infinity)));
  848: 	ok ->
  849: 	    {Localhost,Pb,#sctp_assoc_change{state=cant_assoc}} =
  850: 		recv_event(log_ok(gen_sctp:recv(Sa, infinity)))
  851:     end,
  852:     ok = gen_sctp:listen(Sb, true),
  853:     case gen_sctp:connect_init(Sa, localhost, Pb, []) of
  854: 	ok ->
  855: 	    {Localhost,Pb,#sctp_assoc_change{state=comm_up}} =
  856: 		recv_event(log_ok(gen_sctp:recv(Sa, infinity)))
  857:     end,
  858:     ok = gen_sctp:close(Sa),
  859:     ok = gen_sctp:close(Sb),
  860:     ok.
  861: 
  862: %% Test the API function connectx_init/4.
  863: api_connectx_init(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  864:     Localhost = {127,0,0,1},
  865: 
  866:     {ok,S} = gen_sctp:open(),
  867:     {ok,Pb} = inet:port(S),
  868:     try ?no_return(gen_sctp:connectx_init(S, Localhost, 12345, []))
  869:     catch error:badarg -> ok
  870:     end,
  871:     {error, einval} = gen_sctp:connectx_init(S, [Localhost], not_allowed_for_port, []),
  872:     %% try ?no_return(gen_sctp:connectx_init(S, [Localhost], not_allowed_for_port, []))
  873:     %% catch error:badarg -> ok
  874:     %% end,
  875:     try ?no_return(gen_sctp:connectx_init(S, [Localhost], 12345, not_allowed_for_opts))
  876:     catch error:badarg -> ok
  877:     end,
  878:     ok = gen_sctp:close(S),
  879:     {error,closed} = gen_sctp:connectx_init(S, [Localhost], 12345, []),
  880: 
  881:     {ok,Sb} = gen_sctp:open(Pb),
  882:     {ok,Sa} = gen_sctp:open(),
  883:     {ok, A1} = gen_sctp:connectx_init(Sa, [localhost], Pb, []),
  884:     true = (A1 =/= 0),
  885:     {Localhost,Pb,#sctp_assoc_change{state=cant_assoc, assoc_id = A1}} =
  886: 	recv_event(log_ok(gen_sctp:recv(Sa, infinity))),
  887:     ok = gen_sctp:listen(Sb, true),
  888:     {ok, A2} = gen_sctp:connectx_init(Sa, [localhost], Pb, []),
  889:     true = (A2 =/= 0),
  890:     {Localhost,Pb,#sctp_assoc_change{state=comm_up, assoc_id = A2}} =
  891: 	recv_event(log_ok(gen_sctp:recv(Sa, infinity))),
  892:     ok = gen_sctp:close(Sa),
  893:     ok = gen_sctp:close(Sb),
  894:     ok.
  895: 
  896: recv_event({Addr, Port, [], #sctp_assoc_change{} = AssocChange}) ->
  897:     {Addr, Port, AssocChange};
  898: recv_event({Addr,Port,
  899: 	    [#sctp_sndrcvinfo{assoc_id  = Assoc}],
  900: 	    #sctp_assoc_change{assoc_id = Assoc} = AssocChange}) ->
  901:     {Addr, Port, AssocChange};
  902: recv_event({Addr, Port, [], #sctp_paddr_change{} = PaddrChange}) ->
  903:     {Addr, Port, PaddrChange};
  904: recv_event({Addr, Port,
  905: 	    [#sctp_sndrcvinfo{assoc_id  = Assoc}],
  906: 	    #sctp_paddr_change{assoc_id = Assoc} = PaddrChange}) ->
  907:     {Addr, Port, PaddrChange};
  908: recv_event({Addr, Port, [], #sctp_shutdown_event{} = ShutdownEvent}) ->
  909:     {Addr, Port, ShutdownEvent};
  910: recv_event({Addr, Port,
  911: 	    [#sctp_sndrcvinfo{assoc_id    = Assoc}],
  912: 	    #sctp_shutdown_event{assoc_id = Assoc} = ShutdownEvent}) ->
  913:     {Addr, Port, ShutdownEvent}.
  914: 
  915: %% Test socket options.
  916: api_opts(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  917:     Sndbuf = 32768,
  918:     Recbuf = 65536,
  919:     {ok,S} = gen_sctp:open(0),
  920:     OSType = os:type(),
  921:     case {inet:setopts(S, [{linger,{true,2}}]),OSType} of
  922: 	{ok,_} ->
  923: 	    ok;
  924: 	{{error,einval},{unix,sunos}} ->
  925: 	    ok
  926:     end,
  927:     ok = inet:setopts(S, [{sndbuf,Sndbuf}]),
  928:     ok = inet:setopts(S, [{recbuf,Recbuf}]),
  929:     case inet:getopts(S, [sndbuf]) of
  930: 	{ok, [{sndbuf,SB}]} when SB >= Sndbuf -> ok
  931:     end,
  932:     case inet:getopts(S, [recbuf]) of
  933: 	{ok, [{recbuf, RB}]} when (RB >= Recbuf) -> ok
  934:     end.
  935: 
  936: %% What is this *actually* supposed to test?
  937: implicit_inet6(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  938:     ?TC_TRY(implicit_inet6, fun() -> do_implicit_inet6(Config) end).
  939: 
  940: do_implicit_inet6(_Config) ->
  941:     ?P("begin"),
  942:     %% First
  943:     ?P("try create server socket (1)"),
  944:     case gen_sctp:open(0, [inet6]) of
  945: 	{ok, S1} ->
  946:             Loopback = {0,0,0,0,0,0,0,1},
  947:             ?P("*** ~s: ~p ***", ["Loopback", Loopback]),
  948:             implicit_inet6(S1, Loopback),
  949:             ok = gen_sctp:close(S1),
  950:             
  951:             %% Second
  952:             ?P("try create server socket (2)"),
  953:             Localhost =
  954:                 case inet:getaddr("localhost", inet6) of
  955:                     {ok, LH} ->
  956:                         LH;
  957:                     {error, nxdomain = Reason_getaddr} ->
  958:                         ?SKIPT(Reason_getaddr);
  959:                     {error, Reason_getaddr} ->
  960:                         ct:fail({unexpected, Reason_getaddr})
  961:                 end,
  962:             S2 = case gen_sctp:open(0, [{ip, Localhost}]) of
  963:                      {ok, S} ->
  964:                          S;
  965:                      {error, nxdomain = Reason_open} ->
  966:                          ?SKIPT(Reason_open);
  967:                      {error, Reason_open} ->
  968:                          ct:fail({unexpected, Reason_open})
  969:                  end,
  970: 
  971:             ?P("*** ~s: ~p ***", ["localhost", Localhost]),
  972:             implicit_inet6(S2, Localhost),
  973:             ok = gen_sctp:close(S2),
  974:             
  975:             %% Third
  976:             ?P("try create server socket (3)"),
  977:             Hostname = log_ok(inet:gethostname()),
  978:             Addr     = case inet:getaddr(Hostname, inet6) of
  979:                            {ok, A} ->
  980:                                A;
  981:                            {error, eafnosupport} ->
  982:                                ok = gen_sctp:close(S1),
  983:                                ?SKIPT("Can not look up IPv6 address")
  984:                        end,
  985:             S3 = log_ok(gen_sctp:open(0, [{ifaddr, Addr}])),
  986:             ?P("*** ~s: ~p ***", [Hostname, Addr]),
  987:             implicit_inet6(S3, Addr),
  988:             ok = gen_sctp:close(S1),
  989:             ?P("done"),
  990:             ok;
  991:         {error, eaddrnotavail = Reason} ->
  992:             ?SKIPT(open_failed_str(Reason));
  993:         _ ->
  994:             {skip, "IPv6 not supported"}
  995:     end.
  996: 
  997: 
  998: implicit_inet6(S1, Addr) ->
  999:     ?P("make (server) listen socket"),
 1000:     ok = gen_sctp:listen(S1, true),
 1001:     ServerPortNo = log_ok(inet:port(S1)),
 1002:     ?P("try create (client) socket"),
 1003:     S2 = case gen_sctp:open(0, [inet6, {ifaddr, Addr}]) of
 1004:              {ok, Sock} ->
 1005:                  ?P("client socket created: ~p", [Sock]),
 1006:                  Sock;
 1007:              {error, eaddrnotavail = Reason} ->
 1008:                  ?P("could not create (client) socket with ifaddr: "
 1009:                     "~n   ~p", [Addr]),
 1010:                  ?SKIPT(open_failed_str(Reason))
 1011:     end,
 1012:     {ClientAddr, ClientPortNo} = log_ok(inet:sockname(S2)),
 1013:     ?P("try connect"
 1014:        "~n   from (connector): ~p, ~p (~p)"
 1015:        "~n   to:               ~p, ~p",
 1016:        [ClientAddr, ClientPortNo, S2, Addr, ServerPortNo]),
 1017:     #sctp_assoc_change{state = comm_up} =
 1018: 	log_ok(gen_sctp:connect(S2, Addr, ServerPortNo, [])),
 1019:     ?P("connect success: await events"),
 1020:     implicit_inet6_await_ac_comm_up(S1, ClientAddr, ClientPortNo),
 1021:     ?P("verify server sockname"),
 1022:     case log_ok(inet:sockname(S1)) of
 1023: 	{Addr,              ServerPortNo} -> ok;
 1024: 	{{0,0,0,0,0,0,0,0}, ServerPortNo} -> ok
 1025:     end,
 1026:     ?P("verify client sockname"),
 1027:     case log_ok(inet:sockname(S2)) of
 1028: 	{Addr,              ClientPortNo} -> ok;
 1029: 	{{0,0,0,0,0,0,0,0}, ClientPortNo} -> ok
 1030:     end,
 1031:     ?P("client client socket"),
 1032:     ok = gen_sctp:close(S2),
 1033:     ?P("verification complete"),
 1034:     ok.
 1035: 
 1036: 
 1037: implicit_inet6_await_ac_comm_up(Sock, Addr, PortNo) ->
 1038:     {_OsFam, OsName} = os:type(),
 1039:     implicit_inet6_await_ac_comm_up(Sock, Addr, PortNo, OsName).
 1040: 
 1041: implicit_inet6_await_ac_comm_up(Sock, Addr, PortNo, OsName) ->
 1042:     case recv_event(log_ok(gen_sctp:recv(Sock))) of
 1043: 	{Addr, PortNo, #sctp_assoc_change{state = comm_up}} ->
 1044:             ?P("received assoc-change:comm-up event => done"),
 1045: 	    ok;
 1046: 	{Addr, PortNo, #sctp_paddr_change{state = addr_confirmed,
 1047:                                           addr  = {Addr, PortNo},
 1048:                                           error = 0}} ->
 1049:             ?P("received paddr-change:addr-confirmed event - "
 1050:                "try recv assoc-change:comm-up"),
 1051:             implicit_inet6_await_ac_comm_up(Sock, Addr, PortNo, OsName);
 1052: 
 1053: 	{Addr2, PortNo2, #sctp_assoc_change{state = comm_up}}
 1054:           when (OsName =:= freebsd) ->
 1055:             ?P("Expected (assoc-change:comm-up) event from unexpected address: "
 1056:                "~n   Unexpected Address: ~p, ~p"
 1057:                "~n   Expected Address:   ~p, ~p"
 1058:                "~n   => RETRY"
 1059:                "~n", [Addr2, PortNo2, Addr, PortNo]),
 1060:             implicit_inet6_await_ac_comm_up(Sock, Addr, PortNo, OsName);
 1061: 	{Addr2, PortNo2, #sctp_paddr_change{state = addr_confirmed}}
 1062:           when (OsName =:= freebsd) ->
 1063:             ?P("Expected paddr-change:addr-confirmed event from "
 1064:                "UNEXPECTED ADDRESS: "
 1065:                "~n   UNEXPECTED Address: ~p, ~p"
 1066:                "~n   Expected Address:   ~p, ~p"
 1067:                "~n   => RETRY"
 1068:                "~n", [Addr2, PortNo2, Addr, PortNo]),
 1069:             implicit_inet6_await_ac_comm_up(Sock, Addr, PortNo, OsName);
 1070: 
 1071: 	{Addr2, PortNo2, #sctp_assoc_change{state = comm_up} = CX} = UNEX ->
 1072:             ?P("Expected (assoc-change:comm-up) event from UNEXPECTED ADDRESS: "
 1073:                "~n   UNEXPECTED Address: ~p, ~p"
 1074:                "~n   Expected Address:   ~p, ~p"
 1075:                "~n   Assoc Change:       ~p"
 1076:                "~n", [Addr2, PortNo2, Addr, PortNo, CX]),
 1077:             exit({unexpected_event, UNEX});
 1078: 
 1079: 	{AX, PX, #sctp_paddr_change{state = addr_confirmed} = CX} = UNEX ->
 1080:             ?P("Expected paddr-change:addr-confirmed event from "
 1081:                "UNEXPECTED ADDRESS: "
 1082:                "~n   UNEXPECTED Address: ~p, ~p"
 1083:                "~n   Expected Address:   ~p, ~p"
 1084:                "~n   PAddr Change:       ~p"
 1085:                "~n", [AX, PX, Addr, PortNo, CX]),
 1086:             exit({unexpected_event, UNEX});
 1087: 
 1088:         {AX, PX, CX} = UNEX ->
 1089:             ?P("UNEXPECTED EVENT: "
 1090:                "~n   ~p"
 1091:                "~n   UNEXPECTED ADDRESS: ~p, ~p"
 1092:                "~n   Expected Address:   ~p, ~p"
 1093:                "~n", [CX, AX, PX, Addr, PortNo]),
 1094:             exit({unexpected_event, UNEX})
 1095:     end.
 1096: 
 1097: 
 1098: %% Verify {active, N} socket management.
 1099: %% This is difficult to do since we do not just receive data messages.
 1100: %% Also, how do we know that sctp behaves the same way on all platforms?
 1101: active_n(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1102:     ?TC_TRY(active_n, fun() -> do_active_n(Config) end).
 1103: 
 1104: do_active_n(_Config) ->
 1105:     N = 3,
 1106:     S1 = ok(gen_sctp:open([{active,N}])),
 1107:     [{active,N}] = ok(inet:getopts(S1, [active])),
 1108:     ok = inet:setopts(S1, [{active,-N}]),
 1109:     receive
 1110:         {sctp_passive, S1} -> ok
 1111:     after
 1112:         5000 ->
 1113:             exit({error,sctp_passive_failure})
 1114:     end,
 1115:     [{active,false}] = ok(inet:getopts(S1, [active])),
 1116:     ok = inet:setopts(S1, [{active,0}]),
 1117:     receive
 1118:         {sctp_passive, S1} -> ok
 1119:     after
 1120:         5000 ->
 1121:             exit({error,sctp_passive_failure})
 1122:     end,
 1123:     ok = inet:setopts(S1, [{active,32767}]),
 1124:     {error,einval} = inet:setopts(S1, [{active,1}]),
 1125:     {error,einval} = inet:setopts(S1, [{active,-32769}]),
 1126:     ok = inet:setopts(S1, [{active,-32768}]),
 1127:     receive
 1128:         {sctp_passive, S1} -> ok
 1129:     after
 1130:         5000 ->
 1131:             exit({error,sctp_passive_failure})
 1132:     end,
 1133:     [{active,false}] = ok(inet:getopts(S1, [active])),
 1134:     ok = inet:setopts(S1, [{active,N}]),
 1135:     ok = inet:setopts(S1, [{active,true}]),
 1136:     [{active,true}] = ok(inet:getopts(S1, [active])),
 1137:     receive
 1138:         _ -> exit({error,active_n})
 1139:     after
 1140:         0 ->
 1141:             ok
 1142:     end,
 1143:     ok = inet:setopts(S1, [{active,N}]),
 1144:     ok = inet:setopts(S1, [{active,once}]),
 1145:     [{active,once}] = ok(inet:getopts(S1, [active])),
 1146:     receive
 1147:         _ -> exit({error,active_n})
 1148:     after
 1149:         0 ->
 1150:             ok
 1151:     end,
 1152:     {error,einval} = inet:setopts(S1, [{active,32768}]),
 1153:     ok = inet:setopts(S1, [{active,false}]),
 1154:     [{active,false}] = ok(inet:getopts(S1, [active])),
 1155:     ok = gen_sctp:listen(S1, true),
 1156:     S1Port = ok(inet:port(S1)),
 1157:     S2 = ok(gen_sctp:open(0, [{active,false}])),
 1158:     Assoc = ok(gen_sctp:connect(S2, "localhost", S1Port, [])),
 1159:     ok = inet:setopts(S1, [{active,N}]),
 1160:     active_n_flush_connect_msgs(S1),
 1161:     active_n_send_loop(N, S2, Assoc, S1),
 1162:     S3 = ok(gen_sctp:open([{active,0}])),
 1163:     receive
 1164:         {sctp_passive,S3} ->
 1165:             [{active,false}] = ok(inet:getopts(S3, [active]))
 1166:     after
 1167:         5000 ->
 1168:             exit({error,udp_passive})
 1169:     end,
 1170:     ok = gen_sctp:close(S3),
 1171:     ok = gen_sctp:close(S2),
 1172:     ok = gen_sctp:close(S1),
 1173:     ok.
 1174: 
 1175: 
 1176: %% There is no way to know how many addresses this host has,
 1177: %% and if there is "too many" (more then N = 3), then the
 1178: %% socket may already be passive. In this case the send-
 1179: %% loop will fail.
 1180: %% So, if we get a passive-message here, we just give up (=skip).
 1181: active_n_flush_connect_msgs(Sock) ->
 1182:     %% This seems only to be needed on certain platforms
 1183:     active_n_flush_connect_msgs(os:type(), Sock).
 1184: 
 1185: active_n_flush_connect_msgs(_, Sock) ->
 1186:     do_active_n_flush_connect_msgs(Sock).
 1187: %% active_n_flush_connect_msgs({unix, freebsd}, Sock) ->
 1188: %%     do_active_n_flush_connect_msgs(Sock);
 1189: %% active_n_flush_connect_msgs(_, _) ->
 1190: %%     ok.
 1191: 
 1192: do_active_n_flush_connect_msgs(Sock) ->
 1193:     receive
 1194:         {sctp_passive, Sock} ->
 1195:             ?P("connect-flush-loop -> premature passive"),
 1196:             ?SKIPT("Too many addresses (premature passive)");
 1197: 
 1198:         {sctp, Sock,
 1199:          _FromIP, _FromPort,
 1200:          {[], #sctp_assoc_change{state = comm_up}}} ->
 1201:             ?P("connect-flush-loop -> "
 1202:                "connect message discard - assoc change : comm-up"),
 1203:             ok = inet:setopts(Sock, [{active, 1}]),
 1204:             do_active_n_flush_connect_msgs(Sock);
 1205: 
 1206:         {sctp, Sock,
 1207:          _FromIP, _FromPort,
 1208:          {[], #sctp_paddr_change{state    = addr_confirmed,
 1209:                                  addr     = Addr,
 1210:                                  error    = Error,
 1211:                                  assoc_id = AID}}} ->
 1212:             ?P("connect-flush-loop -> "
 1213:                "connect message discard - paddr change : addr-confirmed:"
 1214:                "~n   Addr:    ~p"
 1215:                "~n   Error:   ~p"
 1216:                "~n   AssocID: ~p", [Addr, Error, AID]),
 1217:             ok = inet:setopts(Sock, [{active, 1}]),
 1218:             do_active_n_flush_connect_msgs(Sock)
 1219: 
 1220:     after 5000 ->
 1221:             ok
 1222:     end.
 1223:             
 1224: active_n_send_loop(Count, SrcSock, SndAssoc, DstSock) ->
 1225:     active_n_send_loop(0, Count, SrcSock, SndAssoc, DstSock).
 1226: 
 1227: active_n_send_loop(Count, Count, _SndSock, _SndAssoc, RcvSock) ->
 1228:     ?P("send-loop -> we are done - wait for passive"),
 1229:     receive
 1230:         {sctp_passive, RcvSock} ->
 1231:             ?P("received passive"),
 1232:             ok
 1233:     after
 1234:         5000 ->
 1235:             ?P("UNEXPECTED TIMEOUT: "
 1236:                "~n   Message Queue:    ~p"
 1237:                "~n   Active:           ~p",
 1238:                [process_info(self(), messages),
 1239:                 inet:getopts(RcvSock, [active])]),
 1240:             exit({error, timeout})
 1241:     end;
 1242: 
 1243: active_n_send_loop(Sent, Count, SndSock, SndAssoc, RcvSock) ->
 1244:     Msg = list_to_binary("message " ++ integer_to_list(Sent+1)),
 1245:     ?P("send-loop(~w,~w) -> send message (on ~p)", [Sent, Count, SndSock]),
 1246:     ok = gen_sctp:send(SndSock, SndAssoc, 0, Msg),
 1247:     receive
 1248:         {sctp, RcvSock, FromIP, FromPort, {[SR], Msg}}
 1249:         when is_record(SR, sctp_sndrcvinfo) ->
 1250:             ?P("send-loop(~w,~w) -> "
 1251:                "recv (expected) data message (on ~p):"
 1252:                "~n   Msg:  ~p"
 1253:                "~n   From: ~p, ~p",
 1254:                [Sent, Count,
 1255:                 RcvSock, Msg, FromIP, FromPort]),
 1256:             active_n_send_loop(Sent+1, Count, SndSock, SndAssoc, RcvSock);
 1257:         
 1258:         {sctp, RcvSock, _FromIP, _FromPort, {_AncData, _Data}} ->
 1259:             %% ignore non-data messages
 1260:             %% we should not get any here because of the flush loop,
 1261:             %% but just in case...
 1262:             ?P("send-loop(~w,~w) -> "
 1263:                "ignore non-data messages (on ~p):"
 1264:                "~n   From:    ~p:~p"
 1265:                "~n   AncData: ~p"
 1266:                "~n   Data:    ~p",
 1267:                [Sent, Count,
 1268:                 RcvSock, _FromIP, _FromPort, _AncData, _Data]),
 1269:             
 1270:             %% It may be too late to update here,
 1271:             %% the socket may already have gone passive 
 1272:             %% and generated a passive message!
 1273:             
 1274:             ok = inet:setopts(RcvSock, [{active, 1}]),
 1275: 
 1276:             active_n_send_loop(Sent, Count, SndSock, SndAssoc, RcvSock);
 1277:         
 1278:         Other ->
 1279:             ?P("send-loop(~w,~w) -> "
 1280:                "UNEXPECTED: "
 1281:                "~n   Other:     ~p"
 1282:                "~n   Send Sock: ~p"
 1283:                "~n   Recv Sock: ~p", [Sent, Count,
 1284:                                       Other, SndSock, RcvSock]),
 1285:             exit({unexpected, Other})
 1286:     after
 1287:         5000 ->
 1288:             exit({error,timeout})
 1289:     end.
 1290:     
 1291: %% Hello world stream socket.
 1292: basic_stream(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1293:     {ok,S} = gen_sctp:open([{type,stream}]),
 1294:     ok = gen_sctp:listen(S, true),
 1295:     ok =
 1296: 	do_from_other_process(
 1297: 	  fun () -> gen_sctp:listen(S, 10) end),
 1298:     ok = gen_sctp:close(S),
 1299:     ok.
 1300: 
 1301: %% Minimal data transfer.
 1302: xfer_stream_min(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1303:     {_, OSName} = os:type(),
 1304:     Stream = 0,
 1305:     Data = <<"The quick brown fox jumps over a lazy dog 0123456789">>,
 1306:     Loopback = {127,0,0,1},
 1307:     {ok,Sb} = gen_sctp:open([{type,seqpacket}]),
 1308:     ?LOGVAR(Sb),
 1309:     {ok,Pb} = inet:port(Sb),
 1310:     ?LOGVAR(Pb),
 1311:     ok = gen_sctp:listen(Sb, true),
 1312: 
 1313:     {ok,Sa} = gen_sctp:open([{type,stream}]),
 1314:     ?LOGVAR(Sa),
 1315:     {ok,Pa} = inet:port(Sa),
 1316:     ?LOGVAR(Pa),
 1317:     #sctp_assoc_change{state=comm_up,
 1318: 		       error=0,
 1319: 		       outbound_streams=SaOutboundStreams,
 1320: 		       inbound_streams=SaInboundStreams,
 1321: 		       assoc_id=SaAssocId_X} =
 1322: 	log_ok(gen_sctp:connect(Sa, Loopback, Pb, [])),
 1323:     ?LOGVAR(SaAssocId_X),
 1324:     [{_,#sctp_paddrinfo{assoc_id=SaAssocId,state=active}}] =
 1325: 	log_ok(inet:getopts(Sa, [{sctp_get_peer_addr_info,
 1326: 				  #sctp_paddrinfo{address={Loopback,Pb}}}])),
 1327:     ?LOGVAR(SaAssocId),
 1328:     match_unless_solaris(SaAssocId_X, SaAssocId),
 1329: 
 1330:     {SbOutboundStreams,SbInboundStreams,SbAssocId} =
 1331: 	case recv_event(log_ok(gen_sctp:recv(Sb, infinity))) of
 1332: 	    {Loopback,Pa,
 1333: 	     #sctp_assoc_change{state=comm_up,
 1334: 				error=0,
 1335: 				outbound_streams=OS,
 1336: 				inbound_streams=IS,
 1337: 				assoc_id=AI}} ->
 1338: 		{OS,IS,AI};
 1339: 	    {Loopback,Pa,
 1340: 	     #sctp_paddr_change{state=addr_confirmed,
 1341: 				addr={Loopback,Pa},
 1342: 				error=0,
 1343: 				assoc_id=AI}} ->
 1344: 		{Loopback,Pa,
 1345: 		 #sctp_assoc_change{state=comm_up,
 1346: 				    error=0,
 1347: 				    outbound_streams=OS,
 1348: 				    inbound_streams=IS,
 1349: 				    assoc_id=AI}} =
 1350: 		    recv_event(log_ok(gen_sctp:recv(Sb, infinity))),
 1351: 		{OS,IS,AI}
 1352: 	end,
 1353:     ?LOGVAR(SbAssocId),
 1354:     SaOutboundStreams = SbInboundStreams,
 1355:     ?LOGVAR(SaOutboundStreams),
 1356:     SbOutboundStreams = SaInboundStreams,
 1357:     ?LOGVAR(SbOutboundStreams),
 1358:     ok = gen_sctp:send(Sa, SaAssocId, 0, Data),
 1359:     case log_ok(gen_sctp:recv(Sb, infinity)) of
 1360: 	{Loopback,
 1361: 	 Pa,
 1362: 	 [#sctp_sndrcvinfo{stream   = Stream,
 1363: 			   assoc_id = SbAssocId}],
 1364: 	 Data} ->
 1365:             ?P("[1] received expected data with ancillary data => done"),
 1366:             ok;
 1367: 
 1368: 	{Loopback,
 1369: 	 Pa,
 1370:          [],
 1371: 	 #sctp_paddr_change{addr     = {Loopback,_},
 1372: 			    state    = addr_available,
 1373: 			    error    = 0,
 1374: 			    assoc_id = SbAssocId}} ->
 1375:             ?P("[2] received paddr change => recv again"),
 1376:             Res2 = log_ok(gen_sctp:recv(Sb, infinity)),
 1377:             ?P("[2] recv ok => "
 1378:                "~n   ~p", [Res2]),
 1379: 	    {Loopback,
 1380: 	     Pa,
 1381: 	     [#sctp_sndrcvinfo{stream   = Stream,
 1382: 			       assoc_id = SbAssocId}],
 1383: 	     Data} = Res2,
 1384:             ?P("[2] received expected data with ancillary data => done"),
 1385:             Res2;
 1386: 
 1387: 	{Loopback,
 1388: 	 Pa,
 1389: 	 [#sctp_sndrcvinfo{stream    = Stream,
 1390: 			   assoc_id  = SbAssocId}],
 1391: 	 #sctp_paddr_change{addr     = {Loopback,_},
 1392: 			    state    = addr_confirmed,
 1393: 			    error    = 0,
 1394: 			    assoc_id = SbAssocId}} ->
 1395:             ?P("[3] received paddr change with ancillary data => recv again"),
 1396:             Res3 = log_ok(gen_sctp:recv(Sb, infinity)),
 1397:             ?P("[3] recv ok => "
 1398:                "~n   ~p", [Res3]),
 1399: 	    {Loopback,
 1400: 	     Pa,
 1401: 	     [#sctp_sndrcvinfo{stream   = Stream,
 1402: 			       assoc_id = SbAssocId}],
 1403: 	     Data} = Res3,
 1404:             ?P("[3] received expected data with ancillary data => done"),
 1405:             Res3;
 1406: 
 1407:         %% It seems that on FreeBSD (for instance) we don't get any
 1408:         %% AncData with this.
 1409: 	{Loopback,
 1410: 	 Pa,
 1411: 	 [],
 1412: 	 #sctp_paddr_change{addr     = {Loopback,_},
 1413: 			    state    = addr_confirmed,
 1414: 			    error    = 0,
 1415: 			    assoc_id = SbAssocId}} when (OSName =:= freebsd) ->
 1416:             ?P("[4] received paddr change without ancillary data => "
 1417:                "recv again"),
 1418:             Res4 = log_ok(gen_sctp:recv(Sb, infinity)),
 1419:             ?P("[4] recv ok => "
 1420:                "~n   ~p", [Res4]),
 1421: 	    {Loopback,
 1422: 	     Pa,
 1423: 	     [#sctp_sndrcvinfo{stream   = Stream,
 1424:                                assoc_id = SbAssocId}],
 1425: 	     Data} = Res4,
 1426:             ?P("[4] received expected data with ancillary data => done"),
 1427:             Res4;
 1428: 
 1429:         {FromIPX, FromPortX, AncDataX, DataX} = Other1 ->
 1430:             ?P("UNEXPECTED: "
 1431:                "~n   FromIP:   ~p"
 1432:                "~n   FromPort: ~p"
 1433:                "~n   AncData:  ~p"
 1434:                "~n   Data:     ~p"
 1435:                "~nwhen"
 1436:                "~n   Loopback: ~p"
 1437:                "~n   Pa:       ~p",
 1438:                [FromIPX, FromPortX, AncDataX, DataX, Loopback, Pa]),
 1439:             exit({unexpected, Other1});
 1440:         Other2 ->
 1441:             ?P("UNEXPECTED: "
 1442:                "~n   Other:    ~p"
 1443:                "~nwhen"
 1444:                "~n   Loopback: ~p"
 1445:                "~n   Pa:       ~p",
 1446:                [Other2, Loopback, Pa]),
 1447:             exit({unexpected, Other2})
 1448:     end,
 1449:     ok =
 1450: 	do_from_other_process(
 1451: 	  fun () -> gen_sctp:send(Sb, SbAssocId, 0, Data) end),
 1452:     case log_ok(gen_sctp:recv(Sa, infinity)) of
 1453: 	{Loopback,Pb,
 1454: 	 [#sctp_sndrcvinfo{stream=Stream,
 1455: 			   assoc_id=SaAssocId}],
 1456: 	 Data} -> ok;
 1457: 	Event1 ->
 1458: 	    {Loopback,Pb,
 1459: 	     #sctp_paddr_change{state=addr_confirmed,
 1460: 				addr={_,Pb},
 1461: 				error=0,
 1462: 				assoc_id=SaAssocId}} =
 1463: 		recv_event(Event1),
 1464: 	    {Loopback,Pb,
 1465: 	     [#sctp_sndrcvinfo{stream=Stream,
 1466: 			       assoc_id=SaAssocId}],
 1467: 	     Data} =
 1468: 		log_ok(gen_sctp:recv(Sa, infinity))
 1469:     end,
 1470:     ok = gen_sctp:close(Sa),
 1471:     {Loopback,Pa,
 1472:      #sctp_shutdown_event{assoc_id=SbAssocId}} =
 1473: 	recv_event(log_ok(gen_sctp:recv(Sb, infinity))),
 1474:     {Loopback,Pa,
 1475:      #sctp_assoc_change{state=shutdown_comp,
 1476: 			error=0,
 1477: 			assoc_id=SbAssocId}} =
 1478: 	recv_event(log_ok(gen_sctp:recv(Sb, infinity))),
 1479:     ok = gen_sctp:close(Sb),
 1480: 
 1481:     receive
 1482: 	Msg -> ct:fail({received,Msg})
 1483:     after 17 -> ok
 1484:     end,
 1485:     ok.
 1486: 
 1487: 
 1488: 
 1489: do_from_other_process(Fun) ->
 1490:     Parent = self(),
 1491:     Ref = make_ref(),
 1492:     Child =
 1493: 	spawn(fun () ->
 1494: 		      try Fun() of
 1495: 			  Result ->
 1496: 			      Parent ! {Ref,Result}
 1497: 		      catch
 1498: 			  Class:Reason:Stacktrace ->
 1499: 			      Parent ! {Ref,Class,Reason,Stacktrace}
 1500: 		      end
 1501: 	      end),
 1502:     Mref = erlang:monitor(process, Child),
 1503:     receive
 1504: 	{Ref,Result} ->
 1505: 	    receive {'DOWN',Mref,_,_,_} -> Result end;
 1506: 	{Ref,Class,Reason,Stacktrace} ->
 1507: 	    receive {'DOWN',Mref,_,_,_} ->
 1508: 		    erlang:raise(Class, Reason, Stacktrace)
 1509: 	    end;
 1510: 	{'DOWN',Mref,_,_,Reason} ->
 1511: 	    erlang:exit(Reason)
 1512:     end.
 1513: 
 1514: 
 1515: %% Peel off an SCTP stream socket ({active,once}).
 1516: 
 1517: peeloff_active_once(Config) ->
 1518:     peeloff(Config, [{active,once}]).
 1519: 
 1520: %% Peel off an SCTP stream socket ({active,true}).
 1521: 
 1522: peeloff_active_true(Config) ->
 1523:     peeloff(Config, [{active,true}]).
 1524: 
 1525: %% Peel off an SCTP stream socket ({active,N}).
 1526: 
 1527: peeloff_active_n(Config) ->
 1528:     peeloff(Config, [{active,1}]).
 1529: 
 1530: peeloff(Config, SockOpts) when is_list(Config) ->
 1531:     Addr = {127,0,0,1},
 1532:     Stream = 0,
 1533:     Timeout = 333,
 1534:     InheritOpts = [{priority, 3}, {sctp_nodelay, true}, {linger, {true, 7}}],
 1535:     %% Verify the last inherit option to make sure no earlier
 1536:     %% option does a silent bailout
 1537:     SurelyInheritedOpt = lists:last(InheritOpts),
 1538:     InheritOptnames = [Opt || {Opt,_} <- InheritOpts],
 1539:     StartTime = timestamp(),
 1540:     {{S1,P1,S1Ai}, {S2,P2,S2Ai}} =
 1541:         socket_pair_open(Addr, StartTime, Timeout),
 1542:     Socket1 = socket_call(S1, get_socket),
 1543:     ?LOGVAR(Socket1),
 1544:     Socket2 = socket_call(S2, get_socket),
 1545:     ?LOGVAR(Socket2),
 1546:     %%
 1547:     socket_call(S2, {send,S2Ai,Stream,<<"Number one">>}),
 1548:     receive
 1549: 	{S1,{Addr,P2,S1Ai,Stream,<<"Number one">>}} -> ok
 1550:     after Timeout ->
 1551: 	    socket_bailout([S1,S2], StartTime)
 1552:     end,
 1553:     socket_call(S2, {send,Socket1,S1Ai,Stream,<<"Number two">>}),
 1554:     receive
 1555: 	{S2,{Addr,P1,S2Ai,Stream,<<"Number two">>}} -> ok
 1556:     after Timeout ->
 1557: 	    socket_bailout([S1,S2], StartTime)
 1558:     end,
 1559:     socket_call(S1, {setopts, InheritOpts}),
 1560:     InheritedOpts = socket_call(S1, {getopts, InheritOptnames}),
 1561:     SurelyInheritedOpt = lists:last(InheritedOpts),
 1562:     %%
 1563:     S3 = socket_peeloff(Socket1, S1Ai, SockOpts, Timeout),
 1564:     ?LOGVAR(S3),
 1565:     P3_X = socket_call(S3, get_port),
 1566:     ?LOGVAR(P3_X),
 1567:     P3 = case P3_X of 0 -> P1; _ -> P3_X end,
 1568:     InheritedOpts = socket_call(S3, {getopts, InheritOptnames}),
 1569:     [{_,#sctp_paddrinfo{assoc_id=S3Ai,state=active}}] =
 1570: 	socket_call(S3,
 1571: 		    {getopts,[{sctp_get_peer_addr_info,
 1572: 			       #sctp_paddrinfo{address={Addr,P2}}}]}),
 1573:     %%S3Ai = S1Ai,
 1574:     ?LOGVAR(S3Ai),
 1575:     %%
 1576:     socket_call(S3, {send,S3Ai,Stream,<<"Number three">>}),
 1577:     receive
 1578: 	{S2,{Addr,P3,S2Ai,Stream,<<"Number three">>}} -> ok
 1579:     after Timeout ->
 1580: 	    socket_bailout([S1,S2,S3], StartTime)
 1581:     end,
 1582:     socket_call(S3, {send,Socket2,S2Ai,Stream,<<"Number four">>}),
 1583:     receive
 1584: 	{S3,{Addr,P2,S3Ai,Stream,<<"Number four">>}} -> ok
 1585:     after Timeout ->
 1586: 	    socket_bailout([S1,S2,S3], StartTime)
 1587:     end,
 1588:     %%
 1589:     inet:i(sctp),
 1590:     socket_close_verbose(S1, StartTime),
 1591:     socket_close_verbose(S2, StartTime),
 1592:     receive
 1593: 	{S3,{Addr,P2,#sctp_shutdown_event{assoc_id=S3Ai_X}}} ->
 1594: 	    match_unless_solaris(S3Ai, S3Ai_X)
 1595:     after Timeout ->
 1596: 	    socket_bailout([S3], StartTime)
 1597:     end,
 1598:     receive
 1599: 	{S3,{Addr,P2,#sctp_assoc_change{state=shutdown_comp,
 1600: 					assoc_id=S3Ai}}} -> ok
 1601:     after Timeout ->
 1602: 	    socket_bailout([S3], StartTime)
 1603:     end,
 1604:     socket_close_verbose(S3, StartTime),
 1605:     [] = flush(),
 1606:     ok.
 1607: 
 1608: %% Check sndbuf and recbuf behaviour.
 1609: buffers(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1610:     Limit = 4096,
 1611:     Addr = {127,0,0,1},
 1612:     Stream = 1,
 1613:     Timeout = 3333,
 1614:     StartTime = timestamp(),
 1615:     {{S1,_P1,S1Ai}, {S2,P2,S2Ai}} = SocketPair =
 1616:         socket_pair_open(Addr, StartTime, Timeout),
 1617:     %%
 1618:     socket_call(S1, {setopts,[{recbuf,Limit}]}),
 1619:     Recbuf =
 1620: 	case socket_call(S1, {getopts,[recbuf]}) of
 1621: 	    [{recbuf,RB1}] when RB1 >= Limit -> RB1
 1622: 	end,
 1623:     Data = mk_data(Recbuf+Limit),
 1624:     socket_call(S2, {setopts,[{sndbuf,Recbuf+Limit}]}),
 1625:     socket_call(S2, {send,S2Ai,Stream,Data}),
 1626:     receive
 1627: 	{S1,{Addr,P2,S1Ai,Stream,Data}} -> ok
 1628:     after Timeout ->
 1629: 	    socket_bailout([S1,S2], StartTime)
 1630:     end,
 1631:     %%
 1632:     socket_pair_close(Addr, StartTime, Timeout, SocketPair).
 1633: 
 1634: mk_data(Bytes) ->
 1635:     mk_data(0, Bytes, <<>>).
 1636: %%
 1637: mk_data(N, Bytes, Bin) when N < Bytes ->
 1638:     mk_data(N+4, Bytes, <<Bin/binary,N:32>>);
 1639: mk_data(_, _, Bin) ->
 1640:     Bin.
 1641: 
 1642: 
 1643: send_block(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1644:     Limit          = 4096,
 1645:     Addr           = {127,0,0,1},
 1646:     Stream         = 1,
 1647:     Timeout        = 1111,
 1648:     ReceiveTimeout = 3333,
 1649:     StartTime      = timestamp(),
 1650:     N              = 8,
 1651:     %%
 1652:     {{S1,P1,S1Ai}, {S2,_P2,S2Ai}} = SocketPair =
 1653:         socket_pair_open(Addr, StartTime, Timeout),
 1654:     %%
 1655:     socket_call(S1, {setopts,[{sndbuf,Limit}]}),
 1656:     Sndbuf =
 1657: 	case socket_call(S1, {getopts,[sndbuf]}) of
 1658: 	    [{sndbuf,SB1}] when SB1 >= Limit -> SB1
 1659: 	end,
 1660:     ?LOGVAR(Sndbuf),
 1661:     Data = mk_data(Sndbuf div 2),
 1662:     Seq = lists:seq(1, N),
 1663:     ok = socket_call(S2, {setopts,[{recbuf,Sndbuf*2},{active,false}]}),
 1664:     Sender = self(),
 1665:     ReceiveFun =
 1666:         fun RF(J) when 0 < J ->
 1667:                 receive
 1668:                     {Sender, send, J} ->
 1669:                         ct:log("send signalled {~w}: ~w~n", [self(), J]),
 1670:                         RF(J + 1)
 1671:                 after Timeout ->
 1672:                         ct:log("send timed out {~w}: ~w~n", [self(), J]),
 1673:                         ok = socket_call(S2, {setopts, [{active, true}]}),
 1674:                         ct:log("set active true {~w}: ~w~n", [self(), J]),
 1675:                         RF(-1)
 1676:                 end;
 1677:             RF(J) when -N =< J, J < 0 ->
 1678:                 receive
 1679:                     {S2,{Addr,P1,S2Ai,Stream,<<I:32,Data/binary>>}} ->
 1680:                         ct:log("recv {~w}: ~w~n", [self(), I]),
 1681:                         I = -J,
 1682:                         RF(J - 1)
 1683:                 after ReceiveTimeout ->
 1684:                         %% For some reason, hopefully not our fault,
 1685:                         %% we'll say OS reason for now, there is a 1..2 s
 1686:                         %% delay between the first and the second message
 1687:                         %% received after setting active=true,
 1688:                         %% even though there are 2 (at least) messages
 1689:                         %% buffered by the sending side.
 1690:                         %%
 1691:                         %% Therefore ReceiveTimeout is above 3 s
 1692:                         %% while Timeout can be shorter...
 1693:                         socket_bailout([S1,S2], StartTime)
 1694:                 end;
 1695:             RF(J) when J < -N ->
 1696:                 ok = socket_controlling_process(S2, Sender),
 1697:                 Sender ! {self(), ok}
 1698:         end,
 1699:     Receiver = spawn_link(fun () -> ReceiveFun(1) end),
 1700:     ok = socket_controlling_process(S2, Receiver),
 1701:     [begin
 1702:          ok = socket_call(S1, {send,S1Ai,Stream,<<J:32,Data/binary>>}),
 1703:          ct:log("send {~w}: ~w~n", [self(), J]),
 1704:          Receiver ! {Sender, send, J}
 1705:      end || J <- Seq],
 1706:     receive {Receiver, ok} -> ok end,
 1707:     %%
 1708:     socket_pair_close(Addr, StartTime, Timeout, SocketPair).
 1709: 
 1710: %% Test opening a multihoming ipv4 socket.
 1711: open_multihoming_ipv4_socket(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1712:     ?P("get addrs by family (inet)"),
 1713:     case get_addrs_by_family(inet, 2) of
 1714: 	{ok, [Addr1, Addr2]} ->
 1715:             ?P("got addrs: "
 1716:                "~n      Addr1: ~p"
 1717:                "~n      Addr2: ~p", [Addr1, Addr2]),
 1718: 	    do_open_and_connect([Addr1, Addr2], Addr1);
 1719: 	{error, Reason} ->
 1720:             ?P("failed get addrs: "
 1721:                "~n      ~p", [Reason]),
 1722: 	    {skip, Reason}
 1723:     end.
 1724: 
 1725: %% This test is mostly aimed to indicate whether host has a
 1726: %% non-working ipv6 setup.  Test opening a unihoming (non-multihoming)
 1727: %% ipv6 socket.
 1728: open_unihoming_ipv6_socket(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1729:     case get_addrs_by_family(inet6, 1) of
 1730: 	{ok, [Addr]} ->
 1731: 	    do_open_and_connect([Addr], Addr);
 1732: 	{error, Reason} ->
 1733: 	    {skip, Reason}
 1734:     end.
 1735: 
 1736: 
 1737: %% Test opening a multihoming ipv6 socket.
 1738: open_multihoming_ipv6_socket(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1739:     case get_addrs_by_family(inet6, 2) of
 1740: 	{ok, [Addr1, Addr2]} ->
 1741: 	    do_open_and_connect([Addr1, Addr2], Addr1);
 1742: 	{error, Reason} ->
 1743: 	    {skip, Reason}
 1744:     end.
 1745: 
 1746: %% Test opening a multihoming ipv6 socket with ipv4 and ipv6 addresses.
 1747: open_multihoming_ipv4_and_ipv6_socket(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1748:     case get_addrs_by_family(inet_and_inet6, 2) of
 1749: 	{ok, [[InetAddr1, InetAddr2], [Inet6Addr1, Inet6Addr2]]} ->
 1750: 	    %% Connect to the first address to test bind
 1751: 	    do_open_and_connect([InetAddr1, Inet6Addr1, InetAddr2],
 1752: 				InetAddr1),
 1753: 	    do_open_and_connect([Inet6Addr1, InetAddr1],
 1754: 				Inet6Addr1),
 1755: 
 1756: 	    %% Connect an address, not the first,
 1757: 	    %% to test sctp_bindx
 1758: 	    do_open_and_connect([Inet6Addr1, Inet6Addr2, InetAddr1],
 1759: 				Inet6Addr2),
 1760: 	    do_open_and_connect([Inet6Addr1, Inet6Addr2, InetAddr1],
 1761: 				InetAddr1);
 1762: 	{error, Reason} ->
 1763: 	    {skip, Reason}
 1764:     end.
 1765: 
 1766: %% Test inet:socknames/peernames on unihoming IPv4 sockets.
 1767: names_unihoming_ipv4(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1768:     do_names(Config, inet, 1).
 1769: 
 1770: %% Test inet:socknames/peernames on unihoming IPv6 sockets.
 1771: names_unihoming_ipv6(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1772:     do_names(Config, inet6, 1).
 1773: 
 1774: %% Test inet:socknames/peernames on multihoming IPv4 sockets.
 1775: names_multihoming_ipv4(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1776:     do_names(Config, inet, 2).
 1777: 
 1778: %% Test inet:socknames/peernames on multihoming IPv6 sockets.
 1779: names_multihoming_ipv6(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1780:     do_names(Config, inet6, 2).
 1781: 
 1782: 
 1783: 
 1784: do_names(_, FamilySpec, AddressCount) ->
 1785:     Fun =
 1786: 	fun (ServerSocket, _, ServerAssoc, ClientSocket, _, ClientAssoc) ->
 1787: 		ServerSocknamesNoassoc =
 1788: 		    lists:sort(ok(inet:socknames(ServerSocket))),
 1789: 		?LOGVAR(ServerSocknamesNoassoc),
 1790: 		ServerSocknames =
 1791: 		    lists:sort(ok(inet:socknames(ServerSocket, ServerAssoc))),
 1792: 		?LOGVAR(ServerSocknames),
 1793: 		[_|_] =
 1794: 		    ordsets:intersection
 1795: 		      (ServerSocknamesNoassoc, ServerSocknames),
 1796: 		ClientSocknamesNoassoc =
 1797: 		    lists:sort(ok(inet:socknames(ClientSocket))),
 1798: 		?LOGVAR(ClientSocknamesNoassoc),
 1799: 		ClientSocknames =
 1800: 		    lists:sort(ok(inet:socknames(ClientSocket, ClientAssoc))),
 1801: 		?LOGVAR(ClientSocknames),
 1802: 		[_|_] =
 1803: 		    ordsets:intersection
 1804: 		      (ClientSocknamesNoassoc, ClientSocknames),
 1805: 		err([einval,enotconn], inet:peernames(ServerSocket)),
 1806: 		ServerPeernames =
 1807: 		    lists:sort(ok(inet:peernames(ServerSocket, ServerAssoc))),
 1808: 		?LOGVAR(ServerPeernames),
 1809: 		err([einval,enotconn], inet:peernames(ClientSocket)),
 1810: 		ClientPeernames =
 1811: 		    lists:sort(ok(inet:peernames(ClientSocket, ClientAssoc))),
 1812: 		?LOGVAR(ClientPeernames),
 1813: 		ServerSocknames = ClientPeernames,
 1814: 		ClientSocknames = ServerPeernames,
 1815: 		{ok,Socket} =
 1816: 		    gen_sctp:peeloff(ServerSocket, ServerAssoc),
 1817: 		SocknamesNoassoc =
 1818: 		    lists:sort(ok(inet:socknames(Socket))),
 1819: 		?LOGVAR(SocknamesNoassoc),
 1820: 		Socknames =
 1821: 		    lists:sort(ok(inet:socknames(Socket, ServerAssoc))),
 1822: 		?LOGVAR(Socknames),
 1823: 		true =
 1824: 		    ordsets:is_subset(SocknamesNoassoc, Socknames),
 1825: 		Peernames =
 1826: 		    lists:sort(ok(inet:peernames(Socket, ServerAssoc))),
 1827: 		?LOGVAR(Peernames),
 1828: 		ok = gen_sctp:close(Socket),
 1829: 		Socknames = ClientPeernames,
 1830: 		ClientSocknames = Peernames,
 1831: 		ok
 1832: 	end,
 1833:     case get_addrs_by_family(FamilySpec, AddressCount) of
 1834: 	{ok, Addresses} when length(Addresses) =:= AddressCount ->
 1835: 	    do_open_and_connect(Addresses, hd(Addresses), Fun);
 1836: 	{error, Reason} ->
 1837: 	    {skip, Reason}
 1838:     end.
 1839: 
 1840: 
 1841: 
 1842: get_addrs_by_family(Family, NumAddrs) ->
 1843:     case os:type() of
 1844: 	{unix,linux} ->
 1845: 	    get_addrs_by_family_aux(Family, NumAddrs);
 1846: 	{unix,freebsd} ->
 1847: 	    get_addrs_by_family_aux(Family, NumAddrs);
 1848: 	{unix,sunos} ->
 1849: 	    case get_addrs_by_family_aux(Family, NumAddrs) of
 1850: 		{ok, [InetAddrs, Inet6Addrs]} when Family =:= inet_and_inet6 ->
 1851: 		    %% Man page for sctp_bindx on Solaris says: "If sock is an
 1852: 		    %% Internet Protocol Version 6 (IPv6) socket, addrs should
 1853: 		    %% be an array of sockaddr_in6 structures containing IPv6
 1854: 		    %% or IPv4-mapped IPv6 addresses."
 1855: 		    {ok, [ipv4_map_addrs(InetAddrs), Inet6Addrs]};
 1856: 		{ok, Addrs} ->
 1857: 		    {ok, Addrs};
 1858: 		{error, Reason} ->
 1859: 		    {error, Reason}
 1860: 	    end;
 1861: 	Os ->
 1862: 	    Reason = if Family =:= inet_and_inet6 ->
 1863: 			     ?F("Mixing ipv4 and ipv6 addresses for "
 1864: 			       " multihoming has not been verified on ~p",
 1865:                                 [Os]);
 1866: 			true ->
 1867: 			     ?F("Multihoming for ~p has not been verified "
 1868:                                 "on ~p", [Family, Os])
 1869: 		     end,
 1870: 	    {error, Reason}
 1871:     end.
 1872: 
 1873: get_addrs_by_family_aux(Family, NumAddrs) when Family =:= inet;
 1874: 					       Family =:= inet6 ->
 1875:     case inet:getaddr(localhost, Family) of
 1876: 	{error, eafnosupport = Reason} ->
 1877:             ?P("failed get (~w) addrs for localhost: ~p", [Family, Reason]),
 1878: 	    {error, ?F("No support for ~p (~p)", [Family, Reason])};
 1879:         {error, nxdomain = Reason} ->
 1880:             ?P("failed get (~w) addrs for localhost: ~p", [Family, Reason]),
 1881: 	    {error, ?F("No support for ~p (~p)", [Family, Reason])};
 1882: 	{ok, _} ->
 1883:             ?P("got addr for localhost (ignored)"),
 1884: 	    IfAddrs = ok(inet:getifaddrs()),
 1885:             ?P("IfAddrs: ~p", [IfAddrs]),
 1886: 	    case filter_addrs_by_family(IfAddrs, Family) of
 1887: 		Addrs when length(Addrs) >= NumAddrs ->
 1888: 		    {ok, lists:sublist(Addrs, NumAddrs)};
 1889: 		[] ->
 1890: 		    {error, ?F("Need ~p ~p address(es) found none~n",
 1891:                                [NumAddrs, Family])};
 1892: 		Addrs ->
 1893: 		    {error,
 1894: 		     ?F("Need ~p ~p address(es) found only ~p: ~p~n",
 1895:                         [NumAddrs, Family, length(Addrs), Addrs])}
 1896: 	    end
 1897:     end;
 1898: get_addrs_by_family_aux(inet_and_inet6, NumAddrs) ->
 1899:     try {ok, [case get_addrs_by_family_aux(Family, NumAddrs) of
 1900:                   {ok, Addrs}     -> Addrs;
 1901:                   {error, Reason} -> throw({error, Reason})
 1902:               end || Family <- [inet, inet6]]}
 1903:     catch
 1904:         throw:{error, _} = ERROR ->
 1905:             ERROR
 1906:     end.
 1907: 
 1908: filter_addrs_by_family(IfAddrs, Family) ->
 1909:     lists:flatten([[Addr || {addr, Addr} <- Info,
 1910: 			    is_good_addr(Addr, Family)]
 1911: 		   || {_IfName, Info} <- IfAddrs]).
 1912: 
 1913: is_good_addr(Addr, inet) when tuple_size(Addr) =:= 4 ->
 1914:     true;
 1915: is_good_addr({0,0,0,0,0,16#ffff,_,_}, inet6) ->
 1916:     false; %% ipv4 mapped
 1917: is_good_addr({16#fe80,_,_,_,_,_,_,_}, inet6) ->
 1918:     false; %% link-local
 1919: is_good_addr(Addr, inet6) when tuple_size(Addr) =:= 8 ->
 1920:     true;
 1921: is_good_addr(_Addr, _Family) ->
 1922:     false.
 1923: 
 1924: ipv4_map_addrs(InetAddrs) ->
 1925:     [begin
 1926: 	 <<AB:16>> = <<A,B>>,
 1927: 	 <<CD:16>> = <<C,D>>,
 1928: 	 {0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 16#ffff, AB, CD}
 1929:      end || {A,B,C,D} <- InetAddrs].
 1930: 
 1931: do_open_and_connect(ServerAddresses, AddressToConnectTo) ->
 1932:     Fun = fun (_, _, _, _, _, _) -> ok end,
 1933:     do_open_and_connect(ServerAddresses, AddressToConnectTo, Fun).
 1934: %%
 1935: do_open_and_connect(ServerAddresses, AddressToConnectTo, Fun) ->
 1936:     {ServerFamily, ServerOpts} = get_family_by_addrs(ServerAddresses),
 1937:     io:format("Serving ~p addresses: ~p~n",
 1938: 	      [ServerFamily, ServerAddresses]),
 1939:     S1 = ok(gen_sctp:open(0, [{ip,Addr} || Addr <- ServerAddresses] ++
 1940: 			      [ServerFamily|ServerOpts])),
 1941:     ok = gen_sctp:listen(S1, true),
 1942:     P1 = ok(inet:port(S1)),
 1943:     ClientFamily = get_family_by_addr(AddressToConnectTo),
 1944:     io:format("Connecting to ~p ~p~n",
 1945: 	      [ClientFamily, AddressToConnectTo]),
 1946:     ClientOpts =
 1947: 	[ClientFamily |
 1948: 	 case ClientFamily of
 1949: 	     inet6 ->
 1950: 		 [{ipv6_v6only,true}];
 1951: 	     _ ->
 1952: 		 []
 1953: 	 end],
 1954:     S2 = ok(gen_sctp:open(0, ClientOpts)),
 1955:     log(open),
 1956:     %% Verify client can connect
 1957:     #sctp_assoc_change{state=comm_up} = S2Assoc =
 1958: 	ok(gen_sctp:connect(S2, AddressToConnectTo, P1, [])),
 1959:     log(comm_up),
 1960:     %% verify server side also receives comm_up from client
 1961:     S1Assoc = recv_comm_up_eventually(S1),
 1962:     Result = Fun(S1, ServerFamily, S1Assoc, S2, ClientFamily, S2Assoc),
 1963:     ok = gen_sctp:close(S2),
 1964:     ok = gen_sctp:close(S1),
 1965:     Result.
 1966: 
 1967: %% If at least one of the addresses is an ipv6 address, return inet6, else inet.
 1968: get_family_by_addrs(Addresses) ->
 1969:     case lists:usort([get_family_by_addr(Addr) || Addr <- Addresses]) of
 1970: 	[inet, inet6] -> {inet6, [{ipv6_v6only, false}]};
 1971: 	[inet]        -> {inet,  []};
 1972: 	[inet6]       -> {inet6, []}
 1973:     end.
 1974: 
 1975: get_family_by_addr(Addr) when tuple_size(Addr) =:= 4 -> inet;
 1976: get_family_by_addr(Addr) when tuple_size(Addr) =:= 8 -> inet6.
 1977: 
 1978: recv_comm_up_eventually(S) ->
 1979:     case ok(gen_sctp:recv(S)) of
 1980: 	{_Addr, _Port, _Info,
 1981: 	 #sctp_assoc_change{state=comm_up} = Assoc} ->
 1982: 	    Assoc;
 1983: 	{_Addr, _Port, _Info, _OtherSctpMsg} = Msg ->
 1984: 	    log({unexpected,Msg}),
 1985: 	    recv_comm_up_eventually(S)
 1986:     end.
 1987: 
 1988: 
 1989: %% 
 1990: recv_close(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1991:     ?P("create server socket (and listen)"),
 1992:     {ok, S} = gen_sctp:open(),
 1993:     gen_sctp:listen(S, true),
 1994:     {ok, SPort} = inet:port(S),
 1995: 
 1996:     ?P("create client socket (and connect)"),
 1997:     {ok, C} = gen_sctp:open(),
 1998:     {ok, _} = gen_sctp:connect(C, localhost, SPort, []),
 1999: 
 2000:     TC = self(),
 2001:     RECV = fun() ->
 2002:                    ?P("try setup recv(s)"),
 2003:                    ok = recv_close_setup_recv(S),
 2004:                    ?P("announce ready"),
 2005:                    TC ! {self(), ready},
 2006:                    ?P("try data recv"),
 2007:                    Res = gen_sctp:recv(S),
 2008:                    ?P("recv res: "
 2009:                       "~n   ~p", [Res]),
 2010:                    exit(Res)
 2011:            end,
 2012:     ?P("spawn reader - then await reader ready"),
 2013:     {Pid, MRef} = spawn_monitor(RECV),
 2014:     receive
 2015:         {'DOWN', MRef, process, Pid, PreReason} ->
 2016:             %% Make sure it does not die for some other reason...
 2017:             ?P("unexpected reader termination:"
 2018:                "~n   ~p", [PreReason]),
 2019:             (catch gen_sctp:close(S)),
 2020:             (catch gen_sctp:close(C)),
 2021:             ct:fail("Unexpected pre close from reader (~p): ~p",
 2022:                           [Pid, PreReason]);
 2023:         {Pid, ready} ->
 2024:             ?P("reader ready"),
 2025:             ok
 2026:     after 30000 -> % Just in case...
 2027:             %% This is **extreme**, but there is no way to know
 2028:             %% how long it will take to iterate through all the
 2029:             %% addresses of a host...
 2030:             ?P("reader ready timeout"),
 2031:             (catch gen_sctp:close(S)),
 2032:             (catch gen_sctp:close(C)),
 2033:             ct:fail("Unexpected pre close timeout (~p)", [Pid])
 2034:     end,
 2035: 
 2036:     ?P("\"ensure\" reader reading..."),
 2037:     receive
 2038:         Any ->
 2039:             ?P("Received unexpected message: "
 2040:                "~n   ~p", [Any]),
 2041:             (catch gen_sctp:close(S)),
 2042:             (catch gen_sctp:close(C)),
 2043:             ct:fail("Unexpected message: ~p", [Any])
 2044:     after 5000 ->
 2045:             ok
 2046:     end,
 2047: 
 2048:     ?P("close server socket"),
 2049:     ok = gen_sctp:close(S),
 2050:     ?P("await reader termination"),
 2051:     receive
 2052:         {'DOWN', MRef, process, Pid, {error, closed}} ->
 2053:             ?P("expected reader termination result"),
 2054:             (catch gen_sctp:close(C)),
 2055:             ok;
 2056:         {'DOWN', MRef, process, Pid, PostReason} ->
 2057:             ?P("unexpected reader termination: "
 2058:                "~n   ~p", [PostReason]),
 2059:             (catch gen_sctp:close(C)),
 2060:             ct:fail("Unexpected post close from reader (~p): ~p",
 2061:                           [Pid, PostReason])
 2062:     after 5000 ->
 2063:             ?P("unexpected reader termination timeout"),
 2064:             demonitor(MRef, [flush]),
 2065:             (catch gen_sctp:close(C)),
 2066:             exit(Pid, kill),
 2067:             ct:fail("Reader (~p) termination timeout", [Pid])
 2068:     end,
 2069:     ?P("close client socket"),
 2070:     (catch gen_sctp:close(C)),
 2071:     ?P("done"),
 2072:     ok.
 2073: 
 2074: 
 2075: recv_close_setup_recv(S) ->
 2076:     recv_close_setup_recv(S, 1).
 2077: 
 2078: recv_close_setup_recv(S, N) ->
 2079:     ?P("try setup recv ~w", [N]),
 2080:     case gen_sctp:recv(S, 5000) of
 2081:         {ok, {Addr,
 2082:               Port,
 2083:               _AncData, 
 2084:               Data}} when is_tuple(Addr) andalso is_integer(Port) ->
 2085:             ?P("setup recv ~w: "
 2086:                "~n   ~p", [N, Data]),
 2087:             recv_close_setup_recv(S, N+1);
 2088:         {error, timeout} ->
 2089:             ok
 2090:     end.
 2091: 
 2092: 
 2093: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
 2094: 
 2095: %% This is the most basic of (sockaddr) tests.
 2096: 
 2097: t_simple_local_sockaddr_in_send_recv(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 2098:     ct:timetrap(?MINS(1)),
 2099:     ?TC_TRY(?FUNCTION_NAME,
 2100:             fun() -> ok end,
 2101:             fun() ->
 2102:                     Domain = inet,
 2103:                     LocalAddr =
 2104:                         case ?LIB:which_local_addr(Domain) of
 2105:                             {ok, LA} ->
 2106:                                 LA;
 2107:                             {error, _} ->
 2108:                                 skip("No local address")
 2109:                         end,
