 2110:                     SockAddr = #{family   => Domain,
 2111:                                  addr     => LocalAddr,
 2112:                                  port     => 0},
 2113:                     do_simple_sockaddr_send_recv(SockAddr, Config)
 2114:             end).
 2115: 
 2116: t_simple_link_local_sockaddr_in_send_recv(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 2117:     ?TC_TRY(?FUNCTION_NAME,
 2118:             fun() -> ok end,
 2119:             fun() ->
 2120:                     Domain = inet,
 2121:                     LinkLocalAddr =
 2122:                         case ?LIB:which_link_local_addr(Domain) of
 2123:                             {ok, LLA} ->
 2124:                                 LLA;
 2125:                             {error, _} ->
 2126:                                 skip("No link local address")
 2127:                         end,
 2128:                     SockAddr = #{family => Domain,
 2129:                                  addr   => LinkLocalAddr,
 2130:                                  port   => 0},
 2131:                     do_simple_sockaddr_send_recv(SockAddr, Config)
 2132:             end).
 2133: 
 2134: 
 2135: t_simple_local_sockaddr_in6_send_recv(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 2136:     ?TC_TRY(?FUNCTION_NAME,
 2137:             fun() -> ?LIB:has_support_ipv6() end,
 2138:             fun() ->
 2139:                     Domain = inet6,
 2140:                     LocalAddr =
 2141:                         case ?LIB:which_local_addr(Domain) of
 2142:                             {ok, LA} ->
 2143:                                 LA;
 2144:                         {error, _} ->
 2145:                             skip("No local address")
 2146:                     end,
 2147:                     SockAddr = #{family   => Domain,
 2148:                                  addr     => LocalAddr,
 2149:                                  port     => 0},
 2150:                     do_simple_sockaddr_send_recv(SockAddr, Config)
 2151:             end).
 2152: 
 2153: 
 2154: t_simple_link_local_sockaddr_in6_send_recv(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 2155:     ?TC_TRY(?FUNCTION_NAME,
 2156:             fun() ->
 2157:                     ?LIB:has_support_ipv6(),
 2158:                     is_net_supported(),
 2159:                     is_not_freebsd()
 2160:             end,
 2161:             fun() ->
 2162:                     Domain = inet6,
 2163:                     LinkLocalAddr =
 2164:                         case ?LIB:which_link_local_addr(Domain) of
 2165:                             {ok, LLA} ->
 2166:                                 LLA;
 2167:                             {error, _} ->
 2168:                                 skip("No link local address")
 2169:                         end,
 2170:                     Filter =
 2171:                         fun(#{addr := #{family := D,
 2172:                                         addr   := A}} = C) ->
 2173:                                 if
 2174:                                     (D =:= Domain) andalso
 2175:                                     (A =:= LinkLocalAddr) ->
 2176:                                         ?P("found link-local candidate: "
 2177:                                            "~n   ~p", [C]),
 2178:                                         true;
 2179:                                     true ->
 2180:                                         false
 2181:                                 end;                                        
 2182:                            (_) ->
 2183:                                 false
 2184:                         end,
 2185:                     case net:getifaddrs(Filter) of
 2186:                         {ok, [#{addr := #{scope_id := ScopeID}} = H|T]} ->
 2187:                             ?P("found link-local candidate(s): "
 2188:                                "~n   Candidate:         ~p"
 2189:                                "~n   Rest Candidate(s): ~p", [H, T]),
 2190:                             SockAddr = #{family   => Domain,
 2191:                                          addr     => LinkLocalAddr,
 2192:                                          port     => 0,
 2193:                                          scope_id => ScopeID},
 2194:                             do_simple_sockaddr_send_recv(SockAddr, Config);
 2195:                         {ok, _} ->
 2196:                             skip("Scope ID not found");
 2197:                         {error, R} ->
 2198:                             skip({failed_getifaddrs, R})
 2199:                     end
 2200:             end).
 2201: 
 2202: do_simple_sockaddr_send_recv(#{family := _Fam} = SockAddr, _) ->
 2203:     %% Create the server
 2204:     Self   = self(),
 2205:     ?P("~n      SockAddr: ~p", [SockAddr]),
 2206:     ServerF = fun() ->
 2207:                       ?P("[server] try create (open) listen socket"),
 2208:                       Sock =
 2209:                           try gen_sctp:open([{ifaddr, SockAddr},
 2210:                                              {active, true},
 2211:                                              binary]) of
 2212:                               {ok, S} ->
 2213:                                   S;
 2214:                               {error, OReason} ->
 2215:                                   ?P("open error: "
 2216:                                      "~n      Reason: ~p", [OReason]),
 2217:                                   exit({open_error, OReason})
 2218:                           catch
 2219:                               OC:OE:OS ->
 2220:                                   ?P("open failure: "
 2221:                                      "~n      Error Class: ~p"
 2222:                                      "~n      Error:       ~p"
 2223:                                      "~n      Call Stack:  ~p", [OC, OE, OS]),
 2224:                                   exit({open_failure, {OC, OE, OS}})
 2225:                           end,
 2226: 
 2227:                       ?P("[server] try make 'listen' socket"),
 2228:                       ok = gen_sctp:listen(Sock, true),
 2229: 
 2230:                       ?P("[server] try get port number"),
 2231:                       {ok, Port}  = inet:port(Sock),
 2232:                       ?P("[server] port: ~w", [Port]),
 2233:                       Self ! {{port, Port}, self()},
 2234: 
 2235: 
 2236:                       ?P("try accept (await 'accept' message)"),
 2237:                       AssocID1 =
 2238:                           receive
 2239:                               {sctp,
 2240:                                Sock,
 2241:                                FromIP11, FromPort11,
 2242:                                {ANC1, #sctp_assoc_change{state            = comm_up,
 2243:                                                          error            = 0,
 2244:                                                          outbound_streams = OutStreams1,
 2245:                                                          inbound_streams  = InStreams1,
 2246:                                                          assoc_id         = AID1}}} ->
 2247:                                   ?P("[server] received assoc - accepted: "
 2248:                                      "~n      From IP:     ~p"
 2249:                                      "~n      From Port:   ~p"
 2250:                                      "~n      ANC:         ~p"
 2251:                                      "~n      Out Streams: ~p"
 2252:                                      "~n      In Streams:  ~p"
 2253:                                      "~n      Assoc ID:    ~p",
 2254:                                      [FromIP11, FromPort11, ANC1,
 2255:                                       OutStreams1, InStreams1, AID1]),
 2256:                                   AID1
 2257:                           end,
 2258: 
 2259:                       ?P("[server] await message 2"),
 2260:                       receive
 2261:                           {sctp, Sock, FromIP12, FromPort12, {_, <<"hej">>}} ->
 2262:                               ?P("[server] received expected message 1: "
 2263:                                  "~n      FromIP2:   ~p"
 2264:                                  "~n      FromPort2: ~p"
 2265:                                  "~n      => send reply", [FromIP12, FromPort12]),
 2266:                               ok = gen_sctp:send(Sock, AssocID1, 1, "hopp")
 2267:                       end,
 2268: 
 2269: 
 2270:                       ?P("try accept (await 'accept' message)"),
 2271:                       AssocID2 =
 2272:                           receive
 2273:                               {sctp,
 2274:                                Sock,
 2275:                                FromIP21, FromPort21,
 2276:                                {ANC2, #sctp_assoc_change{state            = comm_up,
 2277:                                                          error            = 0,
 2278:                                                          outbound_streams = OutStreams2,
 2279:                                                          inbound_streams  = InStreams2,
 2280:                                                          assoc_id         = AID2}}} ->
 2281:                                   ?P("[server] received assoc - accepted: "
 2282:                                      "~n      FromIP:      ~p"
 2283:                                      "~n      FromPort:    ~p"
 2284:                                      "~n      ANC:         ~p"
 2285:                                      "~n      Out Streams: ~p"
 2286:                                      "~n      In Streams:  ~p"
 2287:                                      "~n      Assoc ID:    ~p",
 2288:                                      [FromIP21, FromPort21, ANC2,
 2289:                                       OutStreams2, InStreams2, AID2]),
 2290:                                   AID2
 2291:                           end,
 2292: 
 2293:                       ?P("[server] await message 1"),
 2294:                       receive
 2295:                           {sctp, Sock, FromIP22, FromPort22, {_, <<"hej">>}} ->
 2296:                               ?P("[server] received expected message 1: "
 2297:                                  "~n      From IP:   ~p"
 2298:                                  "~n      From Port: ~p"
 2299:                                  "~n      => send reply", [FromIP22, FromPort22]),
 2300:                               ok = gen_sctp:send(Sock, AssocID2, 1, "hopp")
 2301:                       end,
 2302: 
 2303: 
 2304:                       ?P("[server] await termination command"),
 2305:                       receive
 2306:                           {die, Self} ->
 2307:                               ?P("[server] terminating"),
 2308:                               (catch gen_tcp:close(Sock)),
 2309:                               exit(normal)
 2310:                       end
 2311:               end,
 2312:     ?P("try start server"),
 2313:     Server = spawn_link(ServerF),
 2314:     ?P("server started - await port "),
 2315:     ServerPort = receive
 2316:                      {{port, Port}, Server} ->
 2317:                          Port;
 2318:                      {'EXIT', Server, Reason} ->
 2319:                          ?P("server died unexpectedly: "
 2320:                             "~n      ~p", [Reason]),
 2321:                          exit({unexpected_server_failure, Reason})
 2322:                  end,
 2323:     ?P("server port received: ~p", [ServerPort]),
 2324:     
 2325: 
 2326:     ?P("try create client socket 1"),
 2327:     {ok, CSock1} = gen_sctp:open([{ifaddr, SockAddr},
 2328:                                   {active, true},
 2329:                                   binary]),
 2330: 
 2331:     ?P("client socket 1: "
 2332:        "~n      CSock: ~p"
 2333:        "~n      CPort: ~p", [CSock1, inet:port(CSock1)]),
 2334: 
 2335:     ?P("try connect client socket 1"),
 2336:     ServerSockAddr = SockAddr#{port => ServerPort},
 2337:     {COutStreams1, CInStreams1, CAssocID1} =
 2338:         case gen_sctp:connect(CSock1, ServerSockAddr, [], ?SECS(1)) of
 2339:             {ok, #sctp_assoc_change{state            = comm_up,
 2340:                                     error            = 0,
 2341:                                     outbound_streams = COS1,
 2342:                                     inbound_streams  = CIS1,
 2343:                                     assoc_id         = CAID1}} ->
 2344:                 {COS1, CIS1, CAID1};
 2345:             {ok, Unexpected1} ->
 2346:                 ?P("<ERROR> unexpected connect (1) result: "
 2347:                    "~n      ~p", [Unexpected1]),
 2348:                 ct:fail({unexpected_client_connect_result, 1, Unexpected1});
 2349:             {error, Reason1} ->
 2350:                 ?P("<ERROR> failed client 1 connect: "
 2351:                    "~n      Reason: ~p", [Reason1]),
 2352:                 ct:fail({client_connect_failed, 1, Reason1})
 2353:         end,
 2354: 
 2355:     ?P("client 1 connected: "
 2356:        "~n      Out Streams: ~p"
 2357:        "~n      In Streams:  ~p"
 2358:        "~n      Assoc ID:    ~p", [COutStreams1, CInStreams1, CAssocID1]),
 2359: 
 2360:     ?P("[client 1] try send message"),
 2361:     ok = gen_sctp:send(CSock1, CAssocID1, 1, "hej"),
 2362: 
 2363:     ?P("[client 1] await reply message"),
 2364:     receive
 2365:         {sctp, CSock1, _, _, {_, <<"hopp">>}} ->
 2366:             ?P("received expected reply message")
 2367:     end,
 2368: 
 2369: 
 2370:     ?P("[client 2] try create client socket"),
 2371:     {ok, CSock2} = gen_sctp:open([{ifaddr, SockAddr},
 2372:                                   {active, true},
 2373:                                   binary]),
 2374: 
 2375:     ?P("[client 2] client socket: "
 2376:        "~n      CSock: ~p"
 2377:        "~n      CPort: ~p", [CSock2, inet:port(CSock2)]),
 2378: 
 2379:     ?P("[client 2] try connect-init"),
 2380:     ServerSockAddr = SockAddr#{port => ServerPort},
 2381:     case gen_sctp:connect_init(CSock2, ServerSockAddr, []) of
 2382:         ok ->
 2383:             ok;
 2384:         {error, Reason2} ->
 2385:             ?P("<ERROR> failed client 2 connect: "
 2386:                "~n      Reason: ~p", [Reason2]),
 2387:             ct:fail({client_connect_failed, 2, Reason2})
 2388:     end,
 2389: 
 2390:     ?P("[client 2] await connect completion"),
 2391:     CAssocID2 =
 2392:         receive
 2393:             {sctp,
 2394:              CSock2,
 2395:              CFromIP2, CFromPort2,
 2396:              {CANC2, #sctp_assoc_change{state            = comm_up,
 2397:                                         error            = 0,
 2398:                                         outbound_streams = COutStreams2,
 2399:                                         inbound_streams  = CInStreams2,
 2400:                                         assoc_id         = CAID2}}} ->
 2401:                 ?P("[client 2] connected: "
 2402:                    "~n      From IP:     ~p"
 2403:                    "~n      From Port:   ~p"
 2404:                    "~n      ANC:         ~p"
 2405:                    "~n      Out Streams: ~p"
 2406:                    "~n      In Streams:  ~p"
 2407:                    "~n      Assoc ID:    ~p",
 2408:                    [CFromIP2, CFromPort2, CANC2,
 2409:                     COutStreams2, CInStreams2, CAID2]),
 2410:                 CAID2
 2411:         end,
 2412: 
 2413:     ?P("[client 2] try send message"),
 2414:     ok = gen_sctp:send(CSock2, CAssocID2, 1, "hej"),
 2415: 
 2416:     ?P("[client 2] await reply message"),
 2417:     receive
 2418:         {sctp, CSock2, _, _, {_, <<"hopp">>}} ->
 2419:             ?P("[client 2] received expected reply message")
 2420:     end,
 2421: 
 2422: 
 2423:     ?P("terminate server"),
 2424:     Server ! {die, self()},
 2425: 
 2426:     ?P("await server termination"),
 2427:     receive
 2428:         {'EXIT', Server, normal} ->
 2429:             ok
 2430:     end,
 2431:     
 2432:     ?P("cleanup"),
 2433:     (catch gen_sctp:close(CSock1)),
 2434:     (catch gen_sctp:close(CSock2)),
 2435: 
 2436:     ?P("done"),
 2437:     ok.
 2438: 
 2439:     
 2440: %% Test the sockaddr version of connectx_init/4.
 2441: t_simple_local_sockaddr_in_connectx_init(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 2442:     Localhost = {127,0,0,1},
 2443:     {ok,Sb} = gen_sctp:open(),
 2444:     {ok,Pb} = inet:port(Sb),
 2445:     {ok,Sa} = gen_sctp:open(),
 2446:     SockAddr = #{family   => inet,
 2447:                  addr     => Localhost,
 2448:                  port     => Pb},
 2449:     case gen_sctp:connectx_init(Sa, [SockAddr], []) of
 2450:         {ok, A1} ->
 2451: 	    true = (A1 =/= 0),
 2452:             {Localhost,Pb,#sctp_assoc_change{state=cant_assoc, assoc_id = A1}} =
 2453:                 recv_event(log_ok(gen_sctp:recv(Sa, infinity))),
 2454:             ok = gen_sctp:listen(Sb, true),
 2455:             {ok, A2} = gen_sctp:connectx_init(Sa, [SockAddr], []),
 2456: 	    true = (A2 =/= 0),
 2457:             {Localhost,Pb,#sctp_assoc_change{state=comm_up, assoc_id = A2}} =
 2458:                 recv_event(log_ok(gen_sctp:recv(Sa, infinity))),
 2459:             ok = gen_sctp:close(Sa),
 2460:             ok = gen_sctp:close(Sb);
 2461:         {error, enotsup} ->
 2462:             ok
 2463:     end,
 2464:     ok.
 2465: 
 2466: 
 2467: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
 2468: 
 2469: non_block_send(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 2470:     Cond = fun() -> ok end,
 2471:     Pre  = fun() -> case ?WHICH_LOCAL_ADDR(inet) of
 2472:                         {ok, Addr} ->
 2473:                             Addr;
 2474:                         {error, Reason} ->
 2475:                             throw({skip, Reason})
 2476:                     end
 2477:            end,
 2478:     TC   = fun(Addr) -> do_non_block_send(Config, Addr) end,
 2479:     Post = fun(_) -> ok end,
 2480:     ?TC_TRY(?FUNCTION_NAME, Cond, Pre, TC, Post).
 2481: 
 2482: do_non_block_send(_Config, Addr) ->
 2483:     {Server, Port} = nbs_server_start(Addr),
 2484:     Client         = nbs_client_start(Addr, Port),
 2485:     ok = nbs_await_client_blocked(Client),
 2486:     nbs_command_continue("server", Server),
 2487:     ok = nbs_await_server_recv(Server),
 2488:     nbs_command_continue("client", Client),
 2489:     nbs_command_continue("server", Server),
 2490:     case nbs_await_client_done(Client) of
 2491:         ok ->
 2492:             nbs_server_stop(Server),
 2493:             ok;
 2494:         {error, Reason} ->
 2495:             nbs_server_stop(Server),
 2496:             exit(Reason)
 2497:     end.
 2498: 
 2499: nbs_command_continue(Who, Pid) ->
 2500:     ?P("[ctrl] command ~s continue", [Who]),
 2501:     Pid ! {?MODULE, self(), continue}.
 2502:     
 2503: nbs_await_server_recv(Server) ->
 2504:     ?P("[ctrl] await server recv"),
 2505:     receive
 2506:         {?MODULE, Server, recv} ->
 2507:             ?P("[ctrl] server recv"),
 2508:             ok
 2509:     end.
 2510:     
 2511: nbs_await_client_blocked(Client) ->
 2512:     ?P("[ctrl] await client blocked"),
 2513:     receive
 2514:         {?MODULE, Client, blocked} ->
 2515:             ?P("[ctrl] client blocked"),
 2516:             ok
 2517:     end.
 2518: 
 2519: nbs_await_client_done(Client) ->
 2520:     ?P("[ctrl] await client done"),
 2521:     receive
 2522:         {'EXIT', Client, normal} ->
 2523:             ?P("[ctrl] client done"),
 2524:             ok;
 2525:         {'EXIT', Client, Reason} ->
 2526:             ?P("[ctrl] client failed: "
 2527:                "~n   ~p", [Reason]),
 2528:             {error, Reason}
 2529:     end.
 2530: 
 2531: 
 2532: nbs_server_start(Addr) ->
 2533:     Self = self(),
 2534:     Pid  = spawn_link(fun() -> nbs_server_init(Self, Addr) end),
 2535:     receive
 2536:         {?MODULE, Pid, {ok, Port}} when is_integer(Port) ->
 2537:             {Pid, Port}
 2538:     end.
 2539: 
 2540: nbs_server_stop(Server) ->
 2541:     ?P("[ctrl] command server stop"),
 2542:     Server ! {?MODULE, self(), stop},
 2543:     ?P("[ctrl] await server stopped"),
 2544:     receive
 2545:         {'EXIT', Server, normal} ->
 2546:             ?P("[ctrl] server stopped"),
 2547:             ok;
 2548:         {'EXIT', Server, Reason} ->
 2549:             ?P("[ctrl] server failed: "
 2550:                "~n   ~p", [Reason]),
 2551:             {error, Reason}
 2552:     end.
 2553: 
 2554: nbs_server_init(Parent, Addr) ->
 2555:     ?P("[server] Try create socket"),
 2556:     case gen_sctp:open(0, [{recbuf, 16384}, {ip, Addr}, {debug, true}] ) of
 2557:         {ok, S} ->
 2558:             {ok, [false]} = inet:getopts(S, [non_block_send]),
 2559:             {ok, Port} = inet:port(S),
 2560:             ?P("[server] Try make listen"),
 2561:             ok = gen_sctp:listen(S, true),
 2562:             Parent ! {?MODULE, self(), {ok, Port}},
 2563:             nbs_server_main(Parent, S);
 2564:         {error, Reason} ->
 2565:             exit({server, Reason})
 2566:     end.
 2567: 
 2568: nbs_server_main(Parent, Sock) ->
 2569:     ?P("[server] await controller continue command"),
 2570:     receive
 2571:         {?MODULE, Parent, continue} ->
 2572:             ?P("[server] received controller continue command"),
 2573:             ok
 2574:     end,
 2575:     nbs_server_loop(Parent, Sock, true),
 2576:     ?P("[server] await controller stop command"),
 2577:     receive
 2578:         {?MODULE, Parent, stop} ->
 2579:             ?P("[server] received controller stop command"),
 2580:             gen_sctp:close(Sock)
 2581:     end.
 2582: 
 2583: nbs_server_loop(Parent, Sock, Retry) ->
 2584:     case gen_sctp:recv(Sock, 5000) of
 2585:         {ok, {FromIP, FromPort, AncData, Data}} when is_binary(Data) ->
 2586:             ?P("[server] received data: "
 2587:                "~n   From IP:   ~p"
 2588:                "~n   From Port: ~p"
 2589:                "~n   Anc Data:  ~p"
 2590:                "~n   sz(Data):  ~p",
 2591:                [FromIP, FromPort, AncData, byte_size(Data)]),
 2592:             nbs_server_loop(Parent, Sock, Retry);
 2593:         {ok, {FromIP, FromPort, AncData, Data}} ->
 2594:             ?P("[server] received data: "
 2595:                "~n   From IP:   ~p"
 2596:                "~n   From Port: ~p"
 2597:                "~n   Anc Data:  ~p"
 2598:                "~n   Data:      ~p",
 2599:                [FromIP, FromPort, AncData, Data]),
 2600:             nbs_server_loop(Parent, Sock, Retry);
 2601:         {error, timeout} when (Retry =:= true) ->
 2602:             ?P("[server] receive timeout"),
 2603:             Parent ! {?MODULE, self(), recv},
 2604:             ?P("[server] await controller contue command"),
 2605:             receive
 2606:                 {?MODULE, Parent, continue} ->
 2607:                     ?P("[server] received continue command from controller"),
 2608:                     ok
 2609:             end,
 2610:             nbs_server_loop(Parent, Sock, false);
 2611:         {error, timeout} ->
 2612:             ?P("[server] receive timeout => done"),
 2613:             ok;
 2614:         {error, Reason} ->
 2615:             exit({server_recv, Reason})
 2616:     end.
 2617:             
 2618: 
 2619: nbs_client_start(Addr, Port) ->
 2620:     Self = self(),
 2621:     Pid  = spawn_link(fun() -> nbs_client_init(Self, Addr, Port) end),
 2622:     receive
 2623:         {?MODULE, Pid, ok} ->
 2624:             Pid
 2625:     end.
 2626: 
 2627: nbs_client_init(Parent, Addr, Port) ->
 2628:     OOpts = [{ip, Addr}, {non_block_send, true}],
 2629:     ?P("[client] Try create socket"),
 2630:     case gen_sctp:open(0, OOpts) of
 2631:         {ok, S} ->
 2632:             {ok, [true]} = inet:getopts(S, [non_block_send]),
 2633:             COpts = [{sctp_initmsg, #sctp_initmsg{num_ostreams = 5}}],
 2634:             ?P("[client] Try connect to server"),
 2635:             case gen_sctp:connect(S, Addr, Port, COpts) of
 2636:                 {ok, Assoc} ->
 2637:                     ?P("[client] assoc created"),
 2638:                     inet:setopts(S, [{debug, true}]),
 2639:                     Parent ! {?MODULE, self(), ok},
 2640:                     Data =
 2641:                         list_to_binary(
 2642:                           lists:flatten(
 2643:                             lists:duplicate(1024, "HejHoppDuGlade"))),
 2644:                     nbs_client_loop(Parent, S, Assoc, 0, 0, Data);
 2645:                 {error, CReason} ->
 2646:                     ?P("[client] failed connect: "
 2647:                        "~n   Reason: ~p", [CReason]),
 2648:                     gen_sctp:close(S),
 2649:                     exit({client_connect, CReason})
 2650:             end;
 2651:         {error, OReason} ->
 2652:             ?P("[client] failed create socket: "
 2653:                "~n   Reason: ~p", [OReason]),
 2654:             exit({client_open, OReason})
 2655:     end.
 2656: 
 2657: nbs_client_loop(Parent, S, Assoc, NumWrites, NumBytes, Data) ->
 2658:     nbs_client_loop(Parent, S, Assoc, NumWrites, NumBytes, Data, true).
 2659: 
 2660: nbs_client_loop(Parent, S, Assoc, NumWrites, NumBytes, Data, true) ->
 2661:     ?P("[client,true] try send when"
 2662:        "~n   Num Writes: ~p"
 2663:        "~n   Num Bytes:  ~p", [NumWrites, NumBytes]),
 2664:     %% Should we use all the streams?
 2665:     case gen_sctp:send(S, Assoc, 0, Data) of
 2666:         ok ->
 2667:             nbs_client_loop(Parent, S, Assoc,
 2668:                             NumWrites+1,
 2669:                             NumBytes + byte_size(Data),
 2670:                             Data, true);
 2671:         {error, eagain} ->
 2672:             ?P("[client] send blocked when"
 2673:                "~n   Num Writes: ~p"
 2674:                "~n   Num Bytes:  ~p", [NumWrites, NumBytes]),
 2675:             Parent ! {?MODULE, self(), blocked},
 2676:             ?P("[client] await continue command from controller"),
 2677:             receive
 2678:                 {?MODULE, Parent, continue} ->
 2679:                     ?P("[client] received continue command from controller"),
 2680:                     ok
 2681:             end,
 2682:             nbs_client_loop(Parent, S, Assoc,
 2683:                             NumWrites,
 2684:                             NumBytes,
 2685:                             Data, false);
 2686:         {error, Reason} ->
 2687:             ?P("[client] failed sending message: "
 2688:                "~n   Reason: ~p", [Reason]),
 2689:             gen_sctp:close(S),
 2690:             exit({send_failed, Reason})
 2691:     end;
 2692: nbs_client_loop(_Parent, S, Assoc, NumWrites, NumBytes, Data, false) ->
 2693:     ?P("[client,false] try send when"
 2694:        "~n   Num Writes: ~p"
 2695:        "~n   Num Bytes:  ~p", [NumWrites, NumBytes]),
 2696:     case gen_sctp:send(S, Assoc, 0, Data) of
 2697:         ok ->
 2698:             ?P("[client] sent final message - final option verification"),
 2699:             {ok, [true]} = inet:getopts(S, [non_block_send]),
 2700:             ok = inet:setopts(S, [{non_block_send, false}]),
 2701:             {ok, [false]} = inet:getopts(S, [non_block_send]),            
 2702:             ?P("[client] close socket"),
 2703:             gen_sctp:close(S),
 2704:             ?P("[client] done"),
 2705:             exit(normal);
 2706:         {error, Reason} ->
 2707:             ?P("[client] failed sending last message: "
 2708:                "~n   Reason: ~p", [Reason]),
 2709:             gen_sctp:close(S),
 2710:             exit({send_failed, Reason})
 2711:     end.
 2712: 
 2713: 
 2714: 
 2715: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
 2716: 
 2717: socket_pair_open(Addr, StartTime, Timeout) ->
 2718:     S1 = socket_open([{ip,Addr}], Timeout),
 2719:     ?LOGVAR(S1),
 2720:     P1 = socket_call(S1, get_port),
 2721:     ?LOGVAR(P1),
 2722:     ok = socket_call(S1, {listen,true}),
 2723:     S2 = socket_open([{ip,Addr}], Timeout),
 2724:     ?LOGVAR(S2),
 2725:     P2 = socket_call(S2, get_port),
 2726:     ?LOGVAR(P2),
 2727:     %%
 2728:     socket_call(S2, {connect_init,Addr,P1,[]}),
 2729:     S2Ai =
 2730: 	receive
 2731: 	    {S2,{Addr,P1,
 2732: 		 #sctp_assoc_change{
 2733: 		    state=comm_up,
 2734: 		    assoc_id=S2AssocId}}} -> S2AssocId
 2735: 	after Timeout ->
 2736: 		socket_bailout([S1,S2], StartTime)
 2737: 	end,
 2738:     S1Ai =
 2739: 	receive
 2740: 	    {S1,{Addr,P2,
 2741: 		 #sctp_assoc_change{
 2742: 		    state=comm_up,
 2743: 		    assoc_id=S1AssocId}}} -> S1AssocId
 2744: 	after Timeout ->
 2745: 		socket_bailout([S1,S2], StartTime)
 2746: 	end,
 2747:     {{S1,P1,S1Ai}, {S2,P2,S2Ai}}.
 2748: 
 2749: socket_pair_close(Addr, StartTime, Timeout, {{S1,P1,_S1Ai}, {S2,_P2,S2Ai}}) ->
 2750:     socket_close_verbose(S1, StartTime),
 2751:     receive
 2752: 	{S2,{Addr,P1,#sctp_shutdown_event{assoc_id=S2Ai}}} -> ok
 2753:     after Timeout ->
 2754: 	    socket_bailout([S2], StartTime)
 2755:     end,
 2756:     receive
 2757: 	{S2,{Addr,P1,#sctp_assoc_change{state=shutdown_comp,
 2758: 					assoc_id=S2Ai}}} -> ok
 2759:     after Timeout ->
 2760: 	    socket_bailout([S2], StartTime)
 2761:     end,
 2762:     socket_close_verbose(S2, StartTime),
 2763:     [] = flush(),
 2764:     ok.
 2765: 
 2766: %%% %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
 2767: %%% socket gen_server ultra light
 2768: 
 2769: socket_open(SockOpts0, Timeout) ->
 2770:     SockOpts =
 2771: 	case lists:keyfind(active,1,SockOpts0) of
 2772: 	    false ->
 2773: 		[{active,once}|SockOpts0];
 2774: 	    _ ->
 2775: 		SockOpts0
 2776: 	end,
 2777:     Opts = [{type,seqpacket},binary|SockOpts],
 2778:     Starter =
 2779: 	fun () ->
 2780: 		{ok,Socket} =
 2781: 		    gen_sctp:open(Opts),
 2782: 		Socket
 2783: 	end,
 2784:     s_start(Starter, Timeout).
 2785: 
 2786: socket_peeloff(Socket, AssocId, SocketOpts, Timeout) ->
 2787:     Opts = [binary|SocketOpts],
 2788:     Starter =
 2789: 	fun () ->
 2790: 		{ok,NewSocket} =
 2791: 		    gen_sctp:peeloff(Socket, AssocId),
 2792: 		ok = inet:setopts(NewSocket, Opts),
 2793: 		NewSocket
 2794: 	end,
 2795:     s_start(Starter, Timeout).
 2796: 
 2797: socket_close_verbose(S, StartTime) ->
 2798:     History = socket_history(socket_close(S), StartTime),
 2799:     io:format("socket_close ~p:~n    ~p.~n", [S,History]),
 2800:     History.
 2801: 
 2802: socket_close(S) ->
 2803:     s_req(S, close).
 2804: 
 2805: socket_controlling_process(S, Pid) when is_pid(Pid) ->
 2806:     s_req(S, {controlling_process, Pid}).
 2807: 
 2808: socket_call(S, Request) ->
 2809:     s_req(S, {Request}).
 2810: 
 2811: %% socket_get(S, Key) ->
 2812: %%     s_req(S, {get,Key}).
 2813: 
 2814: socket_bailout([S|Ss], StartTime) ->
 2815:     History = socket_history(socket_close(S), StartTime),
 2816:     io:format("bailout ~p:~n    ~p.~n", [S,History]),
 2817:     socket_bailout(Ss, StartTime);
 2818: socket_bailout([], _) ->
 2819:     io:format("flush: ~p.~n", [flush()]),
 2820:     try throw(socket_bailout)
 2821:     catch throw : Reason : Stacktrace ->
 2822:             io:format("Stacktrace:~n    ~p.~n", [Stacktrace]),
 2823:             ct:fail(Reason)
 2824:     end, ok.
 2825: 
 2826: socket_history({State,Flush}, StartTime) ->
 2827:     {lists:keysort(
 2828:        2,
 2829:        lists:flatten(
 2830: 	 [[{Key,{TS-StartTime,Val}} || {TS,Val} <- Vals]
 2831: 	  || {Key,Vals} <- gb_trees:to_list(State)])),
 2832:      Flush}.
 2833: 
 2834: s_req(S, Req) ->
 2835:     AMref = erlang:monitor(process, S, [{alias, reply_demonitor}]),
 2836:     S ! {?MODULE, AMref, Req},
 2837:     receive
 2838:         {'DOWN', AMref, _, _, Error} ->
 2839:             exit(Error);
 2840:         {?MODULE, AMref, Reply} ->
 2841:             Reply
 2842:     end.
 2843: 
 2844: s_handle_req(Socket, Req) ->
 2845:     case Req of
 2846:         {listen,Listen} ->
 2847: 	    ok = gen_sctp:listen(Socket, Listen);
 2848: 	get_port ->
 2849: 	    ok(inet:port(Socket));
 2850: 	get_socket ->
 2851: 	    Socket;
 2852: 	{connect_init,ConAddr,ConPort,ConOpts} ->
 2853: 	    ok = gen_sctp:connect_init(Socket, ConAddr, ConPort, ConOpts);
 2854: 	{send,AssocId,Stream,Data} ->
 2855: 	    ok = gen_sctp:send(Socket, AssocId, Stream, Data);
 2856: 	{send,OtherSocket,AssocId,Stream,Data} ->
 2857: 	    ok = gen_sctp:send(OtherSocket, AssocId, Stream, Data);
 2858: 	{setopts,Opts} ->
 2859: 	    ok = inet:setopts(Socket, Opts);
 2860: 	{getopts,Optnames} ->
 2861: 	    ok(inet:getopts(Socket, Optnames))
 2862:     end.
 2863: 
 2864: s_start(Starter, Timeout) ->
 2865:     Parent = self(),
 2866:     spawn_link(
 2867:       fun () ->
 2868:               try
 2869:                   Socket = Starter(),
 2870:                   s_loop(Socket, Timeout, Parent, gb_trees:empty())
 2871:               catch
 2872:                   Class:Reason:Stacktrace ->
 2873:                       io:format(?MODULE_STRING":socket exception ~w:~w at~n"
 2874:                                 "~p.~n", [Class,Reason,Stacktrace]),
 2875:                       erlang:raise(Class, Reason, Stacktrace)
 2876:               end
 2877:       end).
 2878: 
 2879: s_loop(Socket, Timeout, Parent, State) ->
 2880:     receive
 2881: 	{?MODULE,AMref,{controlling_process, NewParent}} ->
 2882:             ?P("received (new) controlling process: "
 2883:                "~n   ~p", [NewParent]),
 2884: 	    AMref ! {?MODULE,AMref,ok},
 2885: 	    s_loop(Socket, Timeout, NewParent, State);
 2886: 	{?MODULE,AMref,close} -> % socket_close()
 2887:             ?P("received close"),
 2888: 	    erlang:send_after(Timeout, self(), {?MODULE,AMref,exit}),
 2889: 	    s_loop(Socket, Timeout, Parent, State);
 2890: 	{?MODULE,AMref,exit} ->
 2891:             ?P("received exit"),
 2892: 	    ok = gen_sctp:close(Socket),
 2893: 	    NewState = gb_push(exit, Socket, State),
 2894: 	    AMref ! {?MODULE,AMref,{NewState,flush()}};
 2895: 	{?MODULE,AMref,{Req}} ->
 2896:             ?P("received request: "
 2897:                "~n   ~p", [Req]),
 2898:             Result = s_handle_req(Socket, Req),
 2899: 	    NewState = gb_push(req, {Req,Result}, State),
 2900: 	    AMref ! {?MODULE, AMref,Result},
 2901: 	    s_loop(Socket, Timeout, Parent, NewState);
 2902: 	%% {Parent,AMref,{get,Key}} ->
 2903: 	%%     AMref ! {?MODULE,AMref,gb_get(Key, State)},
 2904: 	%%     s_loop(Socket, Timeout, Parent, State);
 2905: 	{sctp,Socket,Addr,Port,
 2906: 	 {[#sctp_sndrcvinfo{stream=Stream,assoc_id=AssocId}=SRI],Data}}
 2907: 	  when not is_tuple(Data) ->
 2908:             ?P("received [sctp] snd/rcv info: "
 2909:                "~n   Stream:  ~p"
 2910:                "~n   AssocId: ~p", [Stream, AssocId]),
 2911: 	    case gb_get({assoc_change,AssocId}, State) of
 2912: 		[{Addr,Port,
 2913: 		  #sctp_assoc_change{
 2914: 		     state=comm_up,
 2915: 		     inbound_streams=Is}}|_]
 2916: 		  when 0 =< Stream, Stream < Is-> ok;
 2917: 		[] -> ok
 2918: 	    end,
 2919: 	    Key = {msg,AssocId,Stream},
 2920: 	    NewState = gb_push(Key, {Addr,Port,SRI,Data}, State),
 2921: 	    Parent ! {self(),{Addr,Port,AssocId,Stream,Data}},
 2922: 	    again(Socket),
 2923: 	    s_loop(Socket, Timeout, Parent, NewState);
 2924: 	{sctp,Socket,Addr,Port,
 2925: 	 {SRI,#sctp_assoc_change{assoc_id=AssocId,state=St}=SAC}} ->
 2926:             ?P("received [sctp] assoc change: "
 2927:                "~n   AssocId: ~p"
 2928:                "~n   St:      ~p"
 2929:                "~n   SRI:     ~p", [AssocId, St, SRI]),
 2930: 	    case SRI of
 2931: 		[#sctp_sndrcvinfo{assoc_id=AssocId,stream=0}] -> ok;
 2932: 		[] -> ok
 2933: 	    end,
 2934: 	    Key = {assoc_change,AssocId},
 2935: 	    case {gb_get(Key, State),St} of
 2936: 		{[],_} -> ok;
 2937: 		{[{Addr,Port,#sctp_assoc_change{state=comm_up}}|_],_}
 2938: 		  when St =:= comm_lost; St =:= shutdown_comp -> ok
 2939: 	    end,
 2940: 	    NewState = gb_push(Key, {Addr,Port,SAC}, State),
 2941: 	    Parent ! {self(),{Addr,Port,SAC}},
 2942: 	    again(Socket),
 2943: 	    s_loop(Socket, Timeout, Parent, NewState);
 2944: 	{sctp,Socket,Addr,Port,
 2945: 	 {SRI,#sctp_paddr_change{assoc_id=AssocId,
 2946: 				 addr={_,P},
 2947: 				 state=St}=SPC}} ->
 2948:             ?P("received [sctp] paddr change: "
 2949:                "~n   AssocId: ~p"
 2950:                "~n   P:       ~p"
 2951:                "~n   St:      ~p", [AssocId, P, St]),
 2952: 	    match_unless_solaris(Port, P),
 2953: 	    case SRI of
 2954: 		[#sctp_sndrcvinfo{assoc_id=AssocId,stream=0}] -> ok;
 2955: 		[] -> ok
 2956: 	    end,
 2957: 	    case {gb_get({assoc_change,AssocId}, State),St} of
 2958: 		{[{Addr,Port,#sctp_assoc_change{state=comm_up}}|_],_}
 2959: 		  when St =:= addr_available;
 2960: 		       St =:= addr_confirmed -> ok;
 2961: 		{[],addr_confirmed} -> ok
 2962: 	    end,
 2963: 	    Key = {paddr_change,AssocId},
 2964: 	    NewState = gb_push(Key, {Addr,Port,SPC}, State),
 2965: 	    again(Socket),
 2966: 	    s_loop(Socket, Timeout, Parent, NewState);
 2967: 	{sctp,Socket,Addr,Port,
 2968: 	 {SRI,#sctp_shutdown_event{assoc_id=AssocId}=SSE}} ->
 2969:             ?P("received [sctp] shutdown event: "
 2970:                "~n   AssocId: ~p"
 2971:                "~n   SRI:     ~p", [AssocId, SRI]),
 2972: 	    case SRI of
 2973: 		[#sctp_sndrcvinfo{assoc_id=AssocId,stream=0}] -> ok;
 2974: 		[] -> ok
 2975: 	    end,
 2976: 	    case gb_get({assoc_change,AssocId}, State) of
 2977: 		[{Addr,Port,#sctp_assoc_change{state=comm_up}}|_] -> ok;
 2978: 		[] -> ok
 2979: 	    end,
 2980: 	    Key = {shutdown_event,AssocId},
 2981: 	    NewState = gb_push(Key, {Addr,Port}, State),
 2982: 	    Parent ! {self(), {Addr,Port,SSE}},
 2983: 	    again(Socket),
 2984: 	    s_loop(Socket, Timeout, Parent, NewState);
 2985: 	Unexpected ->
 2986:             ?P("received unexpected message: "
 2987:                "~n                ~p"
 2988:                "~nwhen"
 2989:                "~n   Socket Info: ~p",
 2990:                [Unexpected, inet:info(Socket)]),
 2991: 	    erlang:error({unexpected,Unexpected})
 2992:     end.
 2993: 
 2994: again(Socket) ->
 2995:     receive
 2996: 	{sctp_passive,Socket} ->
 2997: 	    [{active, false}] = ok(inet:getopts(Socket, [active])),
 2998: 	    ok = inet:setopts(Socket,[{active,1}])
 2999:     after 0 ->
 3000: 	    ok = inet:setopts(Socket, [{active,once}])
 3001:     end.
 3002: 
 3003: gb_push(Key, Val, GBT) ->
 3004:     TS = timestamp(),
 3005:     case gb_trees:lookup(Key, GBT) of
 3006: 	none ->
 3007: 	    gb_trees:insert(Key, [{TS,Val}], GBT);
 3008: 	{value,V} ->
 3009: 	    gb_trees:update(Key, [{TS,Val}|V], GBT)
 3010:     end.
 3011: 
 3012: gb_get(Key, GBT) ->
 3013:     case gb_trees:lookup(Key, GBT) of
 3014: 	none ->
 3015: 	    [];
 3016: 	{value,V} ->
 3017: 	    [Val || {_TS,Val} <- V]
 3018:     end.
 3019: 
 3020: match_unless_solaris(A, B) ->
 3021:     case os:type() of
 3022: 	{unix,sunos} -> B;
 3023: 	_ -> A = B
 3024:     end.
 3025: 
 3026: 
 3027: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
 3028: 
 3029: 
 3030: is_net_supported() ->
 3031:     try net:info() of
 3032:         #{} ->
 3033:             ok
 3034:     catch
 3035:         error : notsup ->
 3036:             not_supported(net)
 3037:     end.
 3038: 
 3039: 
 3040: is_not_freebsd() ->
 3041:     is_not_platform(freebsd, "FreeBSD").
 3042: 
 3043: is_not_platform(Platform, PlatformStr)
 3044:   when is_atom(Platform) andalso is_list(PlatformStr) ->
 3045:       case os:type() of
 3046:         {unix, Platform} ->
 3047:             skip("This does not work on " ++ PlatformStr);
 3048:         _ ->
 3049:             ok
 3050:     end.
 3051: 
 3052: 
 3053: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
 3054: 
 3055: timestamp() ->
 3056:     erlang:monotonic_time().
 3057: 
 3058: 
 3059: pi(Item) ->
 3060:     {Item, Val} = process_info(self(), Item),
 3061:     Val.
 3062:     
 3063: 
 3064: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
 3065: 
 3066: not_supported(What) ->
 3067:     skip({not_supported, What}).
 3068: 
 3069: skip(Reason) ->
 3070:     throw({skip, Reason}).
 3071: 
 3072: 
 3073: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
 3074: 
 3075: log_ok(X) ->
 3076:     log(ok(X)).
 3077: 
 3078: ok({ok, X}) ->
 3079:     X;
 3080: ok({error, X}) ->
 3081:     ?P("ERROR: ~p", [X]),
 3082:     ct:fail({unexpected_error, X});
 3083: ok(X) ->
 3084:     ?P("UNEXPECTED: ~p", [X]),
 3085:     ct:fail({unexpected, X}).
 3086:     
 3087: 
 3088: log(X) ->
 3089:     ?P("LOG: ~p", [X]),
 3090:     X.
 3091: 
 3092: err([], Result) ->
 3093:     erlang:error(Result);
 3094: err([Reason|_], {error,Reason}) ->
 3095:     ok;
 3096: err([_|Reasons], Result) ->
 3097:     err(Reasons, Result).
 3098: 
 3099: 
 3100: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
 3101: 
 3102: open_failed_str(Reason) ->
 3103:     ?F("Open failed: ~w", [Reason]).
